Walter is a farmer and sows corn, rice, pigeon beans. He does his buying and selling in the canton of Ventanas. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, agricultural supplies like urea, fertilizers, and weedkiller to keep his crops in good condition. The loan will be of great help because he will be able to buy the agricultural supplies.
The challenges that he frequently faces are plagues of pests. His dream is to buy land to sow and cultivate to later sell at a good price that is profitable for his family.
En los tiempos libres he likes to watch soccer.

loans.use: to buy seed, agricultural supplies like urea, fertilizers, and weed killer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cabbages, green maize, and vegetables

loans.name: Luis Felipe

texts.es:
Luis Felipe tiene 31 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo, vive con los padres y con el hijo de once años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

 LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá invertir en la agricultura y comprar los insumos.

Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes son: la competencia, las plagas en los cultivos. El sueño es poderse esforzar para ayudarle al hijo a que culmine los estudios.
En los tiempos libres le gusta el deporte y pasear con el hijo visitando a los familiares.
texts.en:
Luis Felipe is 31 years old and is single. He has one son. He lives with his parents and his 11 year old son in the Ventanas canton in the Ríos province.
The community bank  LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO can be found in Recinto Caimato II, in the parish of Puerto Pechiche which belongs to the Pueblo Viejo canton. This is an area of agricultural laborers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.
Luis is a farmer who sows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. He does his buying and selling in the canton of Ventanas. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and agricultural supplies like urea, fertilizers, and weedkiller to keep his crops in good condition.
The loan will help him greatly because he will be able to invest in his harvest and buy supplies. 
The challenges that he faces frequently are: competition and crop pests. His dream is to be able to be strong so that his son can complete his studies. 
In his free times he likes sport and going out with his son to visit family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural supplies like urea, fertilizers, and weedkiller.

loans.name: Diana Carolina

texts.es:
Diana Carolina tiene 22 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene un hijo , vive con el esposo y con el hijo de 25 días de nacido  en Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Diana se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el Cantón ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque podrá agrandar la cantidad de trabajo en el campo y comprar los insumos y semillas sin ningún problema.
Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes ninguno. El sueño es seguir trabajando para poder comprar más terreno.
En los tiempos libres le gusta bailar.
texts.en:
Diana Carolina is 22, is in a common-law relationship, and has a son. She lives with her husband and 25 day-old son in Ventanas in Los Rios province. The "Dulce Sentimiento" communal bank is located in Recinto Caimito II, in Puerto Pechiche parish, which is part of Pueblo Viejo canton.  

The members of this communal bank work in short cycle agriculture, and grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas. Diane grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. They carry out their purchases and sales in Ventanas canton.

She is applying for the loan to buy seeds, and agricultural supplies such as urea, herbicides, fertilizers, and weed killer, in order to maintain her crop in good condition. 

The loan will be a big help because she will be able to expand her production, and buy supplies and seeds with no difficulty. 

Her dream is to keep  working, in order to buy more land. In her free time she likes to dance.

loans.use: To buy seeds, and agricultural supplies such as urea, herbicides, fertilizers, and weed killer.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman whose husband contributes to providing the family's basic needs. She owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family. 

Mariam has operated a business selling lesos (kanga) for the past 10 years. Her potential clients are the local area residents. She faces a major challenge of transporting her products from point of purchase to her place of sale. She aspires to expand her business.

With the KSHS 40,000, she wants to purchase more pairs of lesos and rent a shop for selling her products. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance because of its fair terms and conditions.

loans.use: To purchase more pairs of lesos and rent a shop

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has four children, all of whom are in school.  She also takes care of additional family members (two orphans). Mary has a business selling charcoal.  She has been in this business for 10 years and she works 6 days out of every week.  Mary sells her products at the market by means of retail. Mary has requested a loan of 400,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bags of charcoal. She also generates additional income through a night parking car park. The main business challenge(s) for Mary include defaulters and seasonality. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to become a wholesaler and to build rental rooms. Mary lives in a home that she owns. She has access to electricity but doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and electricity.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Cesar Leonor

texts.es:
El señor Cesar es de la ciudad de luque, está casado con la señora Celia con quien tiene 3 hijos. Cesar hace aproximadamente 15 años que se dedica a la mecánica de automóviles, empezó trabajando como empleado de varios talleres de la zona y en el año 2007 decidió independizarse. Lo hizo gracias al dinero que pudo juntar de los otros trabajos que hizo y también gracias a la ayuda económica de la fundación, con la cual pudo comprarse las herramientas para su taller. En la actualidad posee una clientela formada, y piensa seguir ampliando su taller, ya que este es el medio de subsistencia de su familia y la de su hogar.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de repuestos para vehículos, lo cual es principal para el ramo al que se dedica. agradece a al fundación por la nueva oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
Cesar is from the city of Luque. He is married to Celia, with whom he has 3 children. Cesar has been working in auto mechanics for approximately 15 years. He began working as an employee in various shops in the area and in 2007 he decided to open his own shop. Thanks to the money he saved from the other jobs he did, and also thanks to the economic assistance of the Foundation, he was able to buy the tools for his shop. He now has an established client base and he plans to expand his shop since this is his family’s and household’s source of income. 

He is requesting a loan to buy replacement parts for cars, which mainly what he works in. He is grateful to the Foundation for the new opportunity that it is giving him.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for cars for use in his car mechanic shop

loans.name: Oswald

texts.en:
Oswald is a resident and farmer in Nkubu, Central Kenya. He is 34 years old and married with 2 children, aged 12 and 9. Both are in school. He has employed one farmhand on his farm and produces bananas, mangoes, pawpaw, and avocado, which all go to the local market.

Oswald has made a loan request amounting to 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to boost his farming. He says 30,000 KES will buy him a water pump, 20,000 KES will be used to buy water pipes, and the remaining 10,000 KES will be used for farm inputs like pesticides and fertilizer. He adds that the improved income will in turn lift his family's living standards.

Oswald mentions pests and diseases and theft of farm produce as the challenges for him.

loans.use: to purchase a water pump, irrigation pipe, and pesticides

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en: This is 28-year-old Aminata. She is married and has two children. In 2007, Aminata established her plastic slippers business. She began her business by selling on market days in the villages. Now she has a stall and travels to various locations to sell. Working 6 days a week and 9 hours a day, she earns about Le 950,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan of Le 3,000,000. Aminata has already received and successfully repaid one loan and now requires a new loan in order to buy additional plastic slippers for her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000. In the future, Aminata plans to educate her children to university level. She pays fees for her children and attends to their medical bills. The loan has been helpful as she now has a stall while continuing with her trips to the villages to sell on market days. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for plastic slippers to sell

loans.name: Kilo

texts.en:
Kilo is a married woman with five school-going children. Her husband is a fisherman who contributes to providing the family's basic needs. She lives in a rental house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her children.

Kilo has operated a retail shop for the past six years. In addition, she runs a vegetable grocery. Her potential clients are the local area residents. She faces a major challenge of transporting her goods from point of purchase to her shop. She dreams of opening a cereal shop in the future. 

With the KSHS 40,000, she wants to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour for her shop. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance because of their fair policies.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour for her shop.

loans.name: Joseph Maina

texts.en:
Joseph is 33 years old, a mixed crop farmer, he is married to Lucy who is also a farmer. They are blessed with one child; age three. Joseph has been a tea farmer for the past year with a monthly income of 8,000 KES, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his second loan term with KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan successfully. Joseph will use the loan to buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm. With the anticipated profit from the business he will venture into fish farming. 

His hopes and dreams are to buy another piece of land to expand tea farming, which will educate his child and improve the living standard of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings

loans.name: Mwanaache

texts.en:
Mwanaache is applying for another loan to start a new grocery business. She will use this 40,000 KES loan to purchase vegetables like tomatoes, onions and potatoes for her grocery. In the future, Mwanaache aspires to continue expanding her businesses. 

Since taking her last Kiva loan, Mwanaache has greatly improved her family’s standard of living. She hopes to continue accessing the financial services offered by Yehu and Kiva lenders and thank you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase vegetables like tomatoes, onions and potatoes for her grocery

loans.name: Maricela

texts.es:
Maricela es una mujer y madre emprendedora que ha luchado para sacar a su familia adelante, se dedica a la confección trabaja día a día con esmero para lograr un progreso notable en sus ingresos, es una mujer muy responsable que le gusta crear y confeccionar prendas para luego venderlas y cumplir con los pedidos que le hacen en el menor tiempo posible para satisfacción de sus clientes.

Actualmente Maricela sueña con sacar una gran producción de prendas de vestir y acolchados, pues se acerca la temporada de fin de año donde las ventas suben y quiere estar preparada para ello, sin embargo no cuenta con el capital para comprar suficientes insumos para confeccionar en mayor cantidad, por lo que solicita un crédito para invertir, en telas, hilos y una maquina que le agilice los procesos, así la colección estará lista a tiempo, sus ingresos se incrementarán y proporcionalmente su calidad de vida mejorará.
texts.en:
Maricela is an enterprising woman and mother who has fought to help her family get ahead.  She is a dressmaker, working industriously day after day in order to markedly increase her earnings. She is a very responsible woman who enjoys creating and making garments for sale and complying, in as short a time as possible, with requests she receives to her customers' satisfaction.

Currently, Maricela dreams of producing a large number of padded garments since the end of year season is approaching when sales increase and she wants to be prepared. Nevertheless, she does not have the capital to buy sufficient supplies to produce a large quantity of merchandise and is requesting a loan to invest in fabric, thread and a machine that will facilitate production. Thus the collection will be ready on time, her income will increase and her quality of life will improve accordingly.

loans.use: to buy supplies for dressmaking such as fabric, thread and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
Gabriel de 22 años de edad, es soltero, vive con sus padres en su casa, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Chepén que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.  Los pobladores de ésta zona se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Gabriel maneja su propia mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) desde hace un año aproximadamente, está actividad lo realiza en la misma zona donde vive, a pesar de la competencia en el mismo trabajo, él trata en lo posible, desde muy temprano movilizar una buena cantidad de pasajeros a sus diferentes destinos, y así pueda tener mayor cantidad de ingresos para solventar sus gastos y necesidades personales.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1500 nuevos soles y su destino será para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi y cubrir algunos gastos de casa.  Gabriel es una persona responsable y trabajadora  que lo único que desea es seguir ayudando a sus padres económicamente.
texts.en:
Gabriel is 22 years old and single. He lives with his parents in their home which has water and electricity. They live in the Chepén district which is in the department of La Libertad. The locals there work in agriculture, livestock, and tourism. 

For about one year, Gabriel has driven his own moto-taxi (transport that is used to go short distances, with a maximum capacity of three people). He runs this business in the same area where he lives.  Despite job competition, he tries his best from very early in the day taking a good number of passengers to various destinations. This way he can have more income to cover his expenses and personal needs. 

The loan he’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for is 1500 nuevos soles. It will be used for maintenance of his moto-taxi and for some household costs. Gabriel is a responsible and hardworking person who only wants to continue supporting his parents financially.

loans.use: to do maintenance work on his moto-taxi and to cover some household costs.

loans.name: Jenny Patricia

texts.es:
Jenny Patricia tiene 36 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene cinco hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Jenny se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá comprar los abonos, semillas sin ningún tipo de problema.

Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
En la familia la relación ha mejorado porque ahora puede aportar un poco más para el bienestar de la familia, en el trabajo le va mucho mejor porque a aumentado la producción en los ingresos a mejorado mucho porque ahora con la venta de los productos obtiene más ingresos. Con el apoyo de anterior crédito le ha ayudado a superarse y no tuvo ningún problema para poder cancelar las cuotas establecidas por la cooperativa. 
Este nuevo Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque podrá sembrar maíz, arroz y cosechar para tener utilidades 
El sueño es seguir trabajando junto a la familia para lograr prosperar en el negocio.

"Esta muy agradecido por la ayuda brindada".
texts.en:
Jenny Patricia is 36 years old, has a common law marriage, and has five children. She lives with  her husband and children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. The V.R.C. Dulce Sentimiento (Sweet Feeling) is in Recinto Caimito II, Puerto Pechiche parrish, Pueblo Viejo Canton. In this area, people do agricultural work with short-cycle corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Jenny works in agriculture planting corn, rice, and pigeon peas. She makes her purchases and sale in the Ventanas Canton. She asks for a loan to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer to keep her crops in good condition. The credit will be a great help because she will be able to buy fertilizers and seeds with no problems. With the money from the previous loan she was able to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer to keep her crops in good condition. 

Within the family, relationships have improved because now she can bring in a bit more for the good of the family. Things are going much better in her work because she has increased production, and income has improved because now she gets a better income from the sale of her products. The support of her previous loan has helped her to succeed, and she had no problems repaying the loan using the schedule set by the communal bank. 

This new loan will be a great help because she will be able to plant corn and rice and to harvest for a profit. Her dream is to continue working together with her family to achieve success in the business. 

"She is very thankful for the help she's received."

loans.use: to buy seed and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer

loans.name: Mwanamkasi

texts.en:
Mwanamkasi is applying for another loan to expand her existing business. She will use this 35,000 KES loan to purchase vegetables like tomatoes, onions and potatoes for her grocery. In the future, Mwanamkasi aspires to continue expanding her business. 

Since taking her last Kiva loan, Mwanamkasi has greatly improved her family’s standard of living. She hopes to continue accessing the financial services offered by Yehu and Kiva lenders and thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase vegetables like tomatoes, onions and potatoes for her grocery

loans.name: Aulghr

texts.en: Aulghr is a hardworking businesswoman aged 43 years. She is married and blessed with two children. For the last five years, she has been running a tailoring business to bring up her family. She also sells cereals for more income generation. In the next five years, she wants to expand her business. With 70,000 Kenya shillings, she wants to buy fabric for her business. Aulghr dreams of buying a piece of land in the future.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
César de 23 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

César desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (ovejas y aves de corral), sus corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada, granos y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos personales.  También cuenta con tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón y una vez que cosecha cuenta con otro ingreso para ayudar en la casa de sus padres.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para la compra de más alimento balanceado y fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo, con las ganancias que obtenga con ambas actividades podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  César es una persona que con esfuerzo y arduo trabajo a sabido salir adelante, permitiendo que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
César is 23 years old and married. He lives with his parents, who don’t have basic utilities, in the rural district of Tambogrande which is in the department of Piura. People in this area work in agriculture or livestock, or they are artisans. 

For a few years César has worked raising and selling farm animals (sheep and poultry). His pens are behind his house, and they are appropriate and ample. He feeds them a well-balanced diet, grains a natural grasses, so that his animals reach an optimal weight and so that he can sell them to different merchants in the area which provides him a good income with which to cover his personal costs. He also has farmland where he plants lemon, and at harvest he has another source of income to help his parents. 

He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to buy more feed and fertilizer to improve his farmland. With the income he gets from both businesses he will be able to repay his loan and have a better quality of life. César is a person who, with much effort and hard work, is able to succeed, allowing his business to grow.

loans.use: to buy more feed and fertilizer to improve his farmland.

loans.name: Parpetua

texts.en: Parpetua is a hardworking businesswoman aged 31 years. She is single. She has been running a general shop business for the last three years to earn a living. Previously, she was involved in farming. Parpetua has employed one person to assist her in managing the business. In the next five years, she plans to establish a wholesale business. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to access loans to boost her business. She has requested a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to buy sugar and rice for resale.

loans.use: to buy sugar and rice

loans.name: Trinidad Teresa

texts.es:
Trinidad Teresa tiene 49 años de edad es soltera tiene cuatro hijos, vive con la familia y con los hijos en el Cantón ventanas provincia de los Ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Trinidad se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá comprar los abonos, semillas sin ningún tipo de problema.
Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
En la familia la relación ha mejorado porque ahora puede aportar un poco más para el bienestar de la familia, en el trabajo le va mucho mejor porque a aumentado la producción en los ingresos a mejorado mucho porque ahora con la venta de los productos obtiene más ingresos. Con el apoyo de anterior crédito le ha ayudado a superarse y no tuvo ningún problema para poder cancelar las cuotas establecidas por la cooperativa. 
Este nuevo Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque podrá sembrar maíz, arroz y cosechar para tener utilidades 
El sueño es seguir trabajando para que algún día pueda compara una casa.
"Esta muy agradecido por la ayuda brindada".
texts.en:
Trinidad Teresa is 49 years old, is single, and has four children. She lives with her family and her children in the Ventanas Canton in the Los Rios Province. The V.R.C. Dulce Sentimiento (Sweet Feeling) is local in Recinto Caimito II, Puerto Pechiche parrish, Pueblo Viejo Canton. This area is known for agricultural work and short-cycle corn, rice, and pigeon peas. 

Trinidad works in agriculture growings corn, rice, and pigeon peas. She makes her purchases and sales in the Ventanas Canton. She asks for a loan to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizers, and weed-killer to keep her crops in good condition. The loan will be a great help because she will be able to buy fertilizers and seeds without a problem. With the money from the last loan she was able to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizers, and weed-killer to keep her crops in good condition. 

Family relationships have improved because now she is able to give a bit more for the good of the family. Work is going very well because she has increased production, and income has improved because she now gets a greater income from the sale of her products. The support of the last loan has helped her to succeed, and she had no problems repaying her loan within the terms set by the communal bank. 

This new loan will be a great help because she will be able to plant corn and rice and to harvest for a profit. Her dream is to continue working so that one day she can buy a house. 

"She is very thankful for the help she’s been given."

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, cooking fat, and rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fishing nets and to repair his roof.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en: Lucia is married and blessed with three children all of whom attend school. She has been farming for the last three years to support her family. She mainly grow potatoes and raises dairy cows.  Lucia has been able to retain her business because of her good reputation with her customers. In the next five years, she wants to expand her business. She has requested for a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings in order to buy a motorbike for easy transportation of milk and potatoes to the market. Thanks to Kiva partner Faulu Kenya, she has been able to adopt the culture of saving.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for transporting potatoes and milk to the market.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en: Hellen is a hardworking business woman aged 39 years-old. She is married and blessed with two children who are in school. She has been practicing dairy farming for the last three years to make a living. She also sells timber for more income. In the next five years, she wants to expand her business. She is requesting for a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings in order to buy more timber to resell. Thanks to Kiva partner Faulu Kenya, she has been able to manage the business with the previous loan.

loans.use: to buy more timber.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is married and blessed with one child. He has been selling electronic goods such as mobile phones and computer accessories to make a living. He has employed one person to assist him to run the business. Previously, he was employed elsewhere. In the next five years, he wants to expand his business. Francis is requesting for a loan of 50,000 Kenya shillings in order to buy a laptop.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy utensils, ingredients to prepare food for sale, and drinks so that she can continue providing good service.

loans.name: Agata

texts.en: Agata is married and blessed with four children. She has been involved in a business of selling clothes for the last four years in order to make a living. She also does farming to increase her income. In the next five years, she plans to manage a boutique. Agata is requesting for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings in order to add stock of clothes to resell. Thanks to Kiva partner Faulu Kenya, she has been able to improve her business with her previous loan.

loans.use: to add stock of clothes.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paul is unmarried and aged 24 years-old. He has been selling computer accessories for the last four years in order to earn a living. Previously, he was employed elsewhere. His potential customers are passerby and neighbors. In the next five years, he wants to expand his business. Paul dreams of becoming more financially stable in the future. He has requested for a loan of 80,000 Kenyan shillings in order to buy computer accessories for resale. Thanks to Kiva partner Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his business with his previous loan from them.

loans.use: to buy computer accessories.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a 26-year-old single man. For the last three years he has been selling electronic goods such as computers, radios and televisions to make a living. Previously he was selling second-hand clothes. Stephen has been able to retain his business because of his good reputation with his customers. In the next five years, he wants to become more financially stable. Since Stephen joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to access loan funds to boost his business. He has requested for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy more computers, radios and televisions for resale.

loans.use: to buy computers, radios and televisions.

loans.name: Del Valle Group

texts.es:
Susana cuenta con 29 años D. edad, es casada tiene un hijo el cual se llama Rodrigo está cursando 2º año D. primaria, su esposo se llama Sebastián el cual se dedica al campo.

Ella se dedica al comercio venD. dulces lo cual e invertirá su préstamo en la compra D. más dulces nuevos, Susana dice que a ella le gustaría que su negocio incrementara un poco mas ya que está pensando poner una dulcería ahora dice que espera ir incrementando y sacar su negocio adelante para así hacer un patrimonio para su familia su esposo también la ayuda con el negocio.

Susana pertenece al grupo Del Valle el cual está integrado por 10 personas 3 hombres y 7 mujeres los cuales se encuentran realizando una actividad comercial a continuación serán mencionados: 

Alberto, Ángela, Adriana, Aidé karenia, Florentino, María del Carmen, Leticia, Gabriela y Andrés. Todos se realizan una actividad comercial como son: venta D. refrescos, pollos, cosméticos, novedades regalos y curiosidades, ropa, productos D. abarrotes, taller D. automotriz, etc.
texts.en:
Susana is 29 years old, married and has a son called Rodrigo who is in second graD.; her husband is called Sebastián and he’s a farmer.

She is a candy merchant and will use her loan to buy more new candy.  Susana says that she’d like her business to grow gradually since she’s thinking about opening a candy store and she’s hoping to grow gradually succeeding in business to build up an inheritance for her family; her husband also helps her with the business.

Susana belongs to the “Del Valle” group which has 10 members, 3 men and 7 women, who are in various commercial activities.  They are: Alberto, Ángela, Adriana, Aidé Karenia, Florentino, María del Carmen, Leticia, Gabriela and Andrés.  They each have their own commercial activity like: sale of soft-drinks, chickens, cosmetics, novelties, gifts and miscellaneous items, clothes, groceries, auto repair shop, etc.

loans.use: to buy more candy.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 45-year-old married man and is blessed with five children, all of whom attend school. He has been practicing dairy farming for the last ten years to support his family. Previously he practiced tea farming. The major challenge he faced was competition. He has requested a loan for 50,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy animal feeds. In the next five years he plans to increase the number of cows he owns. Through the loan funds he has received from Faulu Kenya, Joseph has been able to manage his business and become more business-oriented.

loans.use: to buy animal feeds.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan G. de 39 años se dedica a la comercialización de flores naturales, como rosas, jazmines, gladiolos, claveles etc. Inicialmente esta actividad la realizó en el negocio de un primo, y cuando estuvo preparado para atender él solo el mercado se independizó y ahora genera sus ingresos independientes, desde hace 10 años. Él se encuentra ubicado muy cerca al parque cementerio y sus principales clientes son los familiares de difuntos que se acercan a llevar flores a las tumbas de sus seres amados. En la actividad de venta de flores las fechas de mayor repunte de sus ventas son los fines de semanas y festivos, los días de los difuntos principalmente. Su sueño es convertirse en mayorista de flores pues conoce el mercado de los vendedores al detalle. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará al por mayor y de contado flores para dar inicio a la meta que se propone.
texts.en: Juan G. is 39 years old and sells flowers like roses, jasmine, gladiolus, carnations, etc. In the beginning, he ran this business with his cousin. When he was ready to work at the market on his own, he became independent, and now he has been making his own money for 10 years. He is located close to the cemetery, and his main clients are families of the deceased who come to lay flowers on the graves of their loved ones. In the business of selling flowers, the days of the greatest sales spikes are weekends and festivals, days honoring the deceased mainly. His dream is to become a flower wholesaler since he knows the retail market. Right now he has applied for a Kiva loan, first financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With this he will buy bulk flowers in order to begin going after his goal.

loans.use: to buy bulk flowers such as roses, gladiolus, carnations, etc

loans.name: Clara Luz

texts.es: Clara invirtió su credikiva anterior en la compra de dos lavadoras, ella está muy satisfecha porque todo en su negocio y su hogar giran alineados, pues su hija también contrajo matrimonio y esto la hace muy feliz. Su meta es ampliar su vivienda, hasta terminarla y hacer las respectivas adecuaciones, para ofrecer mayor bienestar a sus hijos. Su mensaje a los financiadores es el siguiente: “Gracias por tan importante apoyo a os microempresarios para así mejorar el nivel de vida. “ En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprará una lavadora mas y hará adecuaciones a su vivienda, porque su negocio se ha crecido y el espacio físico es insuficiente.
texts.en: Clara invested her last Kiva loan into the purchase of two washing machines. She is very happy because everything in her business and her home has gone well. Also her daughter has gotten married, and this made her very happy. Her goal is to build onto her home, to finish it, and to make respective adjustments in order to provide greater comfort to her children. Her message to the lenders is the following: “Thank you for the great help you’ve given to the micro-entrepreneurs because it improves the standard of living.” Right now she is applying for a new Kiva loan with which she’ll buy another washing machine, and she will make adjustments to  her home because she business has grown and the space is insufficient.

loans.use: to buy another washing machine and make adjustments to her home because her business has grown.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is a single lady who lives in a rental house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and water.

Saumu has operated a tailoring business for the past 3 years. Her potential clients are her neighbors. She faces a major challenge of theft. She aspires to expand her business in the future.

With the 12,500 KES loan, she wants to purchase fabrics and threads for her business. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance to get financial help in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics and threads for her business

loans.name: Florence

texts.en: Florence is windowed and blessed with six children who are in school. She describes herself as a hardworking business woman. She has been running a tailoring business for the last nineteen years to support her family. She also does farming for additional income. Florence has been able to retain her business because of a good reputation with her customers. She has employed two people to help her to manage the business. In the next five years she wants to expand her business. She has requested a loan for 50,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) for stocks of fabric for her business. Thanks to Faulu Kenya she has become more financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of fabric

loans.name: San Juditas Group

texts.es:
Norma cuenta con 26 años de edad, es casada tiene 4 hijos los cuales están estudiando el mayor se llama julio está cursando 3º grado de primaria, Jessica está cursando 1º de primaria y Carlos esta en preescolar, el más chico solo cuenta con 1 año de edad su esposo se llama Apolonio se dedica al campo.

Ella se dedica al comercio vende comida lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para hacer los tacos para vender como son: verduras, carne, tortillas, etc. a doña norma le gustaría ampliar su taquería para así tener más clientes y que sus ingresos fueran mas ya que ella ayuda con el gasto de la familia.

Norma pertenece al grupo san juditas el cual está integrado por 11 personas 9 mujeres y 2 hombres a continuación serán mencionadas: ç

Armando, Ma Evodia, Maribel, Martha Isel, Florina, Estefanía, Mercedes, Norma, Alfa, Francisca y Paulino, todos realizan una actividad comercial como son: productos de abarrotes, panadería, comida, cosméticos, pollería, venta de perfumes, venta de tamales, etc.
texts.en:
Norma is 26 years old. She is married and has 4 children who are in school. The oldest is named Julio and is in 3rd grade. Jessica is in first grade and Carlos is in pre-school. The youngest is only a year old. Her husband is named Apolonio and he is a farmer. 

She is a merchant and sells food. She will invest the loan in buying ingredients to make the tacos she sells, such as: vegetables, meat, tortillas, etc. Norma would like to expand her taco business to have more customers and so her income would grow, since she helps with the family expenses.  

Norma belongs to the San Juditas group. It is made up of 11 people, 9 women and 2 men, listed below. 

Armando, Ma Evodia, Maribel, Martha Isel, Florina, Estefanía, Mercedes, Norma, Alfa, Francisca and Paulino. All of them are merchants, selling items such as: groceries, bread, food, cosmetics, chicken, perfume, tamales, etc.

loans.use: to buy ingredients she uses to make the tacos she sells, such as: vegetables, meat, tortillas, etc.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is married and blessed with two children, both of whom attend school. She has been running a tailoring business for the last ten years to support her family. Jane has been able to retain her business because of a good reputation with her customers. She has requested a loan for 50,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy a sewing machine and fabric. In the next five years she plans to manage a boutique. Thanks to Faulu Kenya she has been able to adopt the practice of saving.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Flor Del Campo Group

texts.es:
María de Jesús cuenta con 46 años de edad, es casada tiene 6 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando Joel estudia la preparatoria 2º grado, Brisa esta en 3º de secundaria, Mariana 2º de secundaria, Omar en 6º de primaria y Gerardo esta en 3º de primaria, el más chico esta en 3º de preescolar, su esposo se llama Julio se dedica al campo.

Ella se dedica al comercio frutas por temporada e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de frutas y verduras a doña maría de Jesús le gustaría incrementar su negocio y así tener ingresos para ayudar con la educación de sus hijos ya que Joel esta aun año de finalizar la preparatoria y entrar a la carrera ya que le gustaría estudiar para ingeniero en sistemas.

María de Jesús pertenece al grupo de flor del campo el cual está integrado por 10 personas las cuales son todas mujeres a continuación eran mencionadas:

María Gianelli, Divina, Diana, Flaviana, Luz Divina, Gilberta, Bertina, Claudia, Yaneli, todas se encuentran realizando una actividad comercial como son: venta de ropa, carnicería, dulcería, frutas y verduras, pollerías, joyería, etc.
texts.en:
María de Jesús is 46 years old, married and has six children who are going to school.  Joel is in second year of high school, Brisa is in third grade of secondary school, Mariana is in second grade of secondary school, Omar is in 6th grade of elementary school and Gerardo is in third grade of elementary school; the youngest is in preschool.  Her husband’s name is Julio and he’s a farmer.

She sells seasonal fruit and vegetable and will use her loan to buy fruit and vegetables.  María de Jesús would like to increase her business and have income to help with her children’s education since Joel is a year from completing high school and will start studying a career since he’d like to become a Systems Engineer.

María de Jusús belongs to the “Flor del Campo” group which has 10 members, all women, who we list next:  María Gianelli, Divina, Diana, Flaviana, Luz Divina, Gilberta, Bertina, Claudia and Yaneli.  Each one is involved in her own commercial activity like: clothing sales, butcher shop, candy store, fruit and vegetable sales, chicken shop, jewelry store, etc.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es:
La señora Felicita tiene 42 años de edad, es casada.

Ella se dedica a prestar sus servicios con un molino, que muele maíz y chicharrón para las pupusas. Antes se dedicaba a elaborar y vender tortillas.

Felicita solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para reparar la estructura que soporta el molino, ya que la base esta podrida.

Esto le permitirá tener en buen estado su herramienta de trabajo, y dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y recibir ingresos. A ella le gustaría hacerle mejoras a su casa.
texts.en:
Felicita is 42 years old and is married.

She has a business providing services with her mill, which grinds corn and pork for pupusas (a traditional Salvadoran dish.)  Prior to this  business, she used to make and sell tortillas.

Felicita requests a loan from Fundación Campo to repair the structure that supports her mill, since the base has rotted.

This will allow her to have her work tool in good condition, so that she can provide better service to her customers and receive income.  Felicita would like to make some improvements to her house.

loans.use: to repair the structure that supports her mill

loans.name: Bertha Isabel

texts.es:
Bertha Isabel tiene 44 años de edad vive en casada tiene tres hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Bertha se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

En la familia la relación ha mejorado porque ahora puede aportar un poco más para el bienestar de la familia, en el trabajo le va mucho mejor porque a aumentado la producción en los ingresos a mejorado mucho porque ahora con la venta de los productos obtiene más ingresos. Con el apoyo de anterior crédito le ha ayudado a superarse y no tuvo ningún problema para poder cancelar las cuotas establecidas por la cooperativa. 
El sueño es poder agrandar la cantidad de trabajo y en el futuro comprar una maquinaria desgranadora de maíz. 
"Esta muy agradecido por la ayuda brindada".
texts.en:
Bertha Isabel is 44 years old, married, and has three children. She lives with her husband and children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. The V.R.C. Dulce Sentimiento (Sweet Feeling) is located in Recinto Caimito II, Puerto Pechiche parrish, Pueblo Viejo Canton. This area is dedicated to agricultural work and short-cycle corn, rice, and pigeon peas. 

Bertha does agricultural work planting corn, rice, and pigeon peas. She makes her purchases and sales in the Ventanas Canton. She asked for a loan to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer to keep her crops in good condition. With the money from the last loan she was able to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer to keep her crops in good condition. 

Within the family, relationships have improved because now she can contribute a bit more for the good of the family. Work is going much better because she has increased production and the income has increased a lot because now she gets more money from the sale of her products. The support of the last loan has helped her to succeed, and she had no problem repaying the loan according to the schedule set by the bank.  

Her dream is to be able to increase the amount of work and in the future buy a corn-sheller machine. 

"She is very thankful for the help she’s been given."

loans.use: to buy seed and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer

loans.name: Carlos Ismael

texts.es:
Carlos Ismael tiene 42 años de edad es casado tiene tres hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
En la familia la relación ha mejorado porque ahora puede aportar un poco más para el bienestar de la familia, en el trabajo le va mucho mejor porque a aumentado la producción en los ingresos a mejorado mucho porque ahora con la venta de los productos obtiene más ingresos. 
El sueño es sembrar en cantidad mayor.
"Esta muy agradecido por la ayuda brindada".

Carlos Ismael is 42 years old, married, and has three children. He lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Provinces. The V.R.C. Dulce Sentimiento (Sweet Feeling) is located in Recinto Caimito II, Puerto Pechiche parrish, Pueblo Viejo Canton. This area is dedicated to agricultural work and short-cycle corn, rice, and pigeon peas. 

Carlos does agricultural work planting corn, rice, and pigeon peas. He makes his purchases and sales in the Ventanas Canton. He asks for a loan to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer to keep his crops in good condition. With the money from the last loan he was able to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer to keep his crops in good condition. 

Within the family, relationships have improved because now he can contribute a bit more for the good of the family. Work is going much better because he has increased production and the income has increased a lot because now he gets more money from the sale of his products. The support of the last loan has helped him to succeed, and he had no problem repaying the loan according to the schedule set by the bank.  

His dream is to plant in greater quantity. 

"He is very thankful for the help he's been given."

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer

loans.name: Audri Del Rocío

texts.es:
Audri Del Roció tiene 36 años de edad es casada tiene tres hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Audri del Rocio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
En la familia la relación ha mejorado porque ahora puede aportar un poco más para el bienestar de la familia, en el trabajo le va mucho mejor porque a aumentado la producción en los ingresos a mejorado mucho porque ahora con la venta de los productos obtiene más ingresos. 
El sueño es seguir trabajando y obtener dinero para poder dar a los hijos.
"Está muy agradecido por la ayuda brindada".
texts.en:
Audri Del Roció is 36 years old, married, and has three children. She lives with her husband and children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. The V.R.C. Dulce Sentimiento (Sweet Feeling) is located in Recinto Caimito II, Puerto Pechiche parrish, Pueblo Viejo Canton. This area is dedicated to agricultural work and short-cycle corn, rice, and pigeon peas. 

Audri Del Roció does agricultural work planting corn, rice, and pigeon peas. She makes her purchases and sales in the Ventanas Canton. She asked for a loan to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer to keep her crops in good condition. With the money from the last loan she was able to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer to keep her crops in good condition. 

Within the family, relationships have improved because now she can contribute a bit more for the good of the family. Work is going much better because she has increased production and the income has increased a lot because now she gets more money from the sale of her products. The support of the last loan has helped her to succeed, and she had no problem repaying the loan according to the schedule set by the bank.  

Her dream is to continue working and to get money to be able to give to her children. 

"She is very thankful for the help she's been given."

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer

loans.name: Sylvie Varthan

texts.fr:
Cliente de 42 ans, mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont l'age varie entre 4 et 24 ans. Il y'a bientôt 20 ans, qu'elle a  ouvert  un cafeteria, ou elle vend du pains,des sandwichs avec  du lait, café ,du the et ses potentiels clients sont les élèves, collégiens et lycéens d'un complexe scolaire situe non loin de son lieu d'habitation. 
Ayant déjà bénéficié de plusieurs prêts de Hope Congo , elle a rembourse avec succès et a fait des épargnes considérables.

avec ce nouveau prêt, elle veut continuer dans le meme sens en achetant des cartons de lait en poudre , carton de lait concentre, un sac de sucre, des palettes des œufs, cartons de la margarine et du beurre pasteurise, des cartons de pâtés de porc et de bœuf , cartons de fromages et prendre un abonnement de livraison de pains a une boulangerie de la place.
Elle a des grandes ambitions, celle d'ouvrir un jour un grand restaurant, elle participe a la bonne marche de son foyer et aide son mari a construire la maison familiale.
texts.en:
This client is 42 years old, she is married with 6 children between the ages of 4 and 24 years. She opened a cafeteria nearly 20 years ago where she sells bread, sandwiches with milk, coffee, tea, and her potential customers are students, college students and high school pupils from a school complex situated not far from her home.
She has already benefitted from several loans from Hope Congo, and she has repaid them successfully and made considerable savings.

With this new loan, she wishes to continue in the same way by  purchasing  cartons of powdered milk, cartons of  condensed milk, a bag of sugar, trays of eggs, boxes of  pasteurised  margarine and butter ,boxes of pork and beef pâté, cartons of cheese and also by  booking  regular bread  delivery from a local baker.
She has great ambitions; to open a big restaurant  one day . She contributes to the smooth running of her household and is helping her husband to build a house for the family.

loans.use: To buy cartons of milk, canned goods, butter, margarine, and eggs.

loans.name: Jessica Consuelo

texts.es:
Jessica Consuelo tiene 33 años de edad vive en Unión Libre tiene cinco hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Jessica se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. 
Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
En la familia la relación ha mejorado porque ahora puede aportar un poco más para el bienestar de la familia, en el trabajo le va mucho mejor porque a aumentado la producción en los ingresos a mejorado mucho porque ahora con la venta de los productos obtiene más ingresos. 
El sueño es trabajar para reunir suficiente dinero para poderles dar el estudio para que lleguen hacer profesionales.
En los tiempos libres le gusta escuchar música
texts.en:
Jessica Consuelo is 33 years old. She lives with her common law husband and 5 children in the Ventanas canton in the Ríos province.
The community bank LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO can be found in Recinto Caimato II, in the parish of Puerto Pechiche which belongs to the Pueblo Viejo canton. This is an area of agricultural laborers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.
Jessica is a farmer who sows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. She does her buying and selling in the canton of Ventanas. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and agricultural supplies like urea, fertilizers, and weedkiller to keep her crops in good condition. She also used the money from her previous loan to buy seeds and agricultural supplies  like urea, fertilizers, and weedkiller to keep her crops in good condition.
Her family relationships have improved because now she is able to bring in a little more for the family wellbeing. Things are going much better for her work because she has increased production and her revenues have improved a lot because now, with the sale of her produce, she gets better income.
Her dream is to work and get enough money so that her children can study to become professionals. 
In her free time she likes to listen to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricul agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza

loans.name: Isatu

texts.en:
This is 40-year-old Isatu. She is married to a security officer and has 5 children ages 25, 20, 11, 8 and 5 years. Three children attend school, while the other 2 are doing petty trading. 

In 2006, Isatu established her household utensils business. She began her business because she gained experience from her foster parent in the fish business. But when she got married, her husband told her to change the business to household utensils because of the loss she was getting from the fish business. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, Isatu earns about 1,300,000 SLL every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Isatu has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase plastic drums - 5 pieces @ 600,000 SLL, set pans - 2 cartons @ 900,000 SLL, rubber bowls - 3 dozen @ 900,000 SLL and drinking buckets - 2 dozens @ 480,000 SLL. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 300,000 SLL.

Isatu's major challenge is limited capital to buy more stock. She serves 10 customers each day. Her business is popular because she sells items that are used by a majority of people. She reinvests the profit back into the business. She is planning to expand, and this can be achieved through proper utilization of her capital and profit.   

In the future, Isatu plans to have a shop and build a house. She is also planning to give her children a quality education and improve their standard of living. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase various household utensils for her business

loans.name: Mebry Rosmery

texts.es:
Mebry, tiene 29 años de edad, es soltera.

Se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino (vacas)  y   porcino (cerdos) junto  a su mamá, quines tienen  más de 10 años de dedicarse ha esta actividad. La mamá de Mebry, se dedicaba a la crianza de ganado, por eso ella aprendió esta actividad. 

Actualmente cuentan con 10 animales y un terreno, donde se alimentan, una pequeña quebrada (corriente de agua) en donde toman agua. 

Mebry, antes de dedicarse a la crianza de ganado, tenía destace de cerdos y un molino de dos tolvas,  estas actividades no eran muy rentables, por eso se dedico a la crianza y comercio de ganado.

El ganado lo compra en los tiangues (lugar en donde se comercializa con animales) aledaños a la zona, que se encuentran en la ciudad y hay una distancia del cantón a la ciudad de 6 kilómetros, cuando se compran en este tiangue los semovientes son trasladados por la calle arriándolos. También cuando algunos vecinos o lugareños de la zona quieren vender ellos les avisan y los van ha ver. Si les parecen los compran.

El préstamo será invertido, en la compra de ganado para la crianza, si son novillas comprara cinco,  pero si son vacas lecheras comprara dos, ya que son más caras. Al comprar dos vacas lecheras la producción de leche será mayor tomando en cuenta, que ya tiene unas vacas y podrá procesar mas lecha para la elaboración de lácteos. De esta manera, cubrirá la necesidad de muchas personas que buscan los lácteos y se les dice que no hay, también aumentara los niveles de ganancia, mejorando su  nivel de vida.

Mebry, tiene planes a futuro según sea la producción y crianza de ganado, con los ingresos que obtenga ella quiere  mejorar  los establos y dar un espacio mayor para que los animales se desarrollen mejor y aumentar la cantidad de ganado que posee.
texts.en:
Mebry is 29 years old and single. She raises cows and pigs with her mother and they have more than 10 years experience in this activity. Mebrey's mother used to raise cattle; that's where Mebry learned this trade.

They buy there cattle in a market where animals are sold, some 6 kilometers outside their zone in the city. When buying from this market, the livestock have to be transferred on foot. When neighbors or local residents of the zone want to sell animals, they send for Mebry and her mother to come to see the livestock. If the animals look good, they buy them.

The loan will be invested in purchasing cattle to raise. If they are heifers, they will buy 5, but if they are milk cows, they will buy 2, due to the greater expense. If they buy 2 milk cows, their milk production will increase, of course, since they already have cows, and they will process more milk into milk products. In this manner, they will be able to cover the needs of more customers who upon looking for milk products, say the supply is insufficient. Also, they will augment the level of their earnings, improving their standard of living.

Mebry has plans for the future, depending on their level of production and livestock raising. With the income she earns, Mebry wants to improve the stables and provide a larger space for the animals so they can develop better and to increase the number of cattle she has.

loans.use: to buy livestock to raise. If there are heifers, she will buy 5; if there are milk cows, she will buy 2.

loans.name: San Jose Barrio Group

texts.es:
El grupo "Barrio San Jose" esta ubicada en una comunidad muy alejada de cetro de la comunidad, tiene muchas milpas donde se cultiva el maiz, el nombre del grupo lo eligieron las mismas representantes del grupo barrio porque ellas se encuentran en un barrio de la comunidad y San Jose porque cercas de ahi esta la iglesia y el santo patrono de la comunidad se llama San Jose es por eso que el grupo se llama "San Jose Barrio" y esta integrado por 8 integrantes todas son mujeres campesinas y muy trabajadoras, esta vez todas han pedido el credito para invertir en sus negocios, Doña leticia comprara borregos y puerquitos, la señora Fernanda comprara borregos, Araceli comprara Puercos, la señora Aurelia comprara puercos y pollos, Maria Guadalupe invertira en su papeleria, Doña Teresa comprara puercos.
Y finalmente doña Ofelia la representante del grupo tiene 41 años de edad esta casada desde hace 7 años, con el señor Jose Noe quien trabaja de obrero, juntos han procreado 4 hijos, Anel Edith de 13 años de edad esta en tercero de secundaria, Anelis de de 12 años de edad esta cursando primero de secundaria, Noe Govani de 10 años esta quinto año de primaria y Alma Belen de 6 años de edad esta cursando ya primer año de primaria.
Doña Ofelia es ama de casa sin embargo se dedica a la crianza de animales esta vez ha solicitado el credito para comprar 2 marranos, 15 pollos, alimento y maiz. En la actividad lleva ya 10 años en su casa tiene 2 marraonos, 4 pollos y patito.
Ella los compra pequeños y los vende cuando ya estan grandes, con sus ganancias ella puede comprar alimento, calzado para toda sui familia o vuelve ha comprar mas animales.
la meta que tiene es hacer crecer su ganado para poder obtener mayores ganacias y mejorar su caliada de vida y vivienda
"Estamos muy agradecidas por el apoyo que nos dan ya que ha sido de gran ayuda para poder mejorar nuestra caliadad de vida para nosotras y nuestras familias"
texts.en:
The “Barrio San Jose” group is located in a remote area very far from the center of the community. There are many fields where corn is grown. The “Barrio” part of name of the group was chosen by the members of the group because they live in a neighborhood (Barrio) in the community. The “San Jose” comes was chosen because the church in the area and the patron saint of the community is named San Jose. 

The group has eight members. They are all very hard-working, country women. This time, all the women have requested the loan in order to invest in their businesses. Leticia will purchase sheep and piglets. Fernanda will buy sheep. Araceli will buy pigs. Teresa will buy pigs also.

 Finally, Ofelia, the representative of the group, is 41 years old. She has been married for seven years to Jose Noe who is a construction worker. Together, they have four children. Anel Edith is 13 years old and she is in the third year of secondary school. Anelis is 12 years old. She is in her first year of secondary school. Noe Govani is ten years old and is in the fifth year of primary school. Alma Belen is six years old. She is in her first year of primary school. 

Ofelia is a housewife. However, she also raises animals. This time, she is requesting a loan to purchase two pigs, 15 chickens, food and corn. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has two pigs, four chickens and a duck. She buys them when they are small and sells them when they are big. With her earnings, she can buy food and shoes for her family or she can purchase more animals. 

Her goal is to increase her amount of livestock in order to earn more income and to improve her quality of life and her home. 

The group says, “we are very grateful for the support you have given us, it has been a great help to be able to improve the quality of our lives for ourselves and our families.”

loans.use: purchase 2 pigs, 15 chickens as well as food and corn.

loans.name: Adrienne

texts.fr:
Cliente de 48 ans, mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont l'age varie entre 15 et 25 ans.Elle s'est lancée dans la vente de la friperie , il y'a bientôt 30 ans.Elle achète des ballots de friperie comme des serviettes non utilisées, des peignoirs, et des draps. 
Elle a des stratégies de vente très efficace, elle achète des ballots de serviettes , draps et elle les vend aux clients par crédit et le reste , elle vend dans sa boutique.
Ayant déjà beneficiee de plusieurs prêts,elle a rembourse ses prêts avec succès et a fait des épargnes considérables.Ces prêts ont fortement changes les conditions de sa vie de famille, ses enfants fréquentent des universités privées et elle est entrain d'aider son mari a construire leur maison familiale.
texts.en:
Adrienne, aged 48, is married and the mother of four children aged between 15 and 25. She has been selling secondhand clothing for nearly 30 years. She buys bundles of secondhand clothes, such as unused towels, robes and sheets. Her sales strategy is very efficient. She buys bundles of towels and sheets, and then resells them on credit to her customers. Part of her sales is carried out in her store.

Adrienne was already granted several loans, which she paid off successfully and which enabled her to save a considerable amount of money. These loans have strongly improved the living condition of her family. Today her children attend private universities and she helps her husband with the construction of their family home.

loans.use: to buy bundles of unused towels, robes and sheets.

loans.name: Eduardo Daniel

texts.es:
Eduardo Daniel tiene 39 años de edad vive en unión libre no tiene hijos, vive con la esposa en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Eduardo Daniel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. 
Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá comprar los abonos, semillas sin ningún tipo de problema.
Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes son: la competencia, las plagas de langosta en el maíz. El sueño es seguir trabajando para poder reunir dinero y comprarse una casa para poder vivir cómodamente.
En los tiempos libres le gusta dedicarse a ver los sembríos.
texts.en:
Eduardo Daniel is 39 years old and lives with his common law wife and doesn't have any children. They live in the Ventanas canton in the Ríos province.
The community bank LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO can be found in Recinto Caimato II, in the parish of Puerto Pechiche which belongs to the Pueblo Viejo canton. This is an area of agricultural laborers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.
Eduardo Daniel is a farmer who sows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. He does his buying and selling in the canton of Ventanas. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and agricultural supplies like urea, fertilizers, and weedkiller to keep his crops in good condition.
The loan will help him greatly because he will be able to buy fertilizers and seeds without any problem.
The challenges that he faces frequently are: competition and crop pests, particularly locusts in the corn. His dream is to keep working and be able to save money and buy a house where he can live comfortably.  
In his free times he likes to see the crops.

loans.use: para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza

loans.name: Jonathan Nestor

texts.es:
Jonathan Nestor tiene 23 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con la esposa y con el hijo en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Jonathan se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá comprar los abonos, insumos y  semillas sin ningún tipo de problema.
Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes son: la competencia, las plagas de langosta en el maíz. El sueño es que nunca le falte el trabajo para poder dar el estudio al hijo.
En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
23 year old Jonathan Nestor lives with his common law wife and one son  in the Ventanas canton in the Ríos province.
The community bank LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO can be found in Recinto Caimato II, in the parish of Puerto Pechiche which belongs to the Pueblo Viejo canton. This is an area of agricultural laborers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.
Jonathan Nestor is a farmer who sows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. He does his buying and selling in the canton of Ventanas. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and agricultural supplies like urea, fertilizers, and weedkiller to keep his crops in good condition.
The loan will help him greatly because he will be able to buy fertilizers and seeds without any problem.
The challenges that he faces frequently are: competition and crop pests, particularly locusts in the corn. His dream is that he will never be out of work so that his son can study. 
In his free time, he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like urea, fertilizer, and weedkiller.

loans.name: Khardiata

texts.fr: Madame Khardiata vit au Sénégal et  est âgée  de 48 ans. Elle exerce l’activité de vente de crème et de glace. Elle a choisi cette activité par nécessité pour se procurer des revenus. Elle est  membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC depuis 2002 et a déjà bénéficié de 2 prêts antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de  produits locaux de base qu’elle utilise pour faire la crème et du sucre en quantité assez importante, afin d’ accroitre sa marge bénéficiaire.  L’augmentation de ses revenus  lui permet de mieux  prendre en charge ses propres besoins et aussi soutenir son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en: Mrs. Khardiata lives in Senegal and is 48 years of age. She works selling ice cream and ice. She has picked this activity because of the need to secure an income. She has been a member of a branch of U-IMCEC since 2002 and had two prior loans. She is seeking a loan of 150,000 for the purchase of local products on the base of which she is going to make ice cream as well as big quantities of sugar, in order to increase her sales margin. The increase of her income will allow her to take care of her own needs as well as   help her husband provide for   everyday family expenses

loans.use: to buy local products and sugar for preparing ice cream for sale

loans.name: Eloy Irineo

texts.es:
Eloy Irineo tiene 62 años de edad es soltero tiene dos hijos, vive con la familia y con los hijos de 24 y 21 años de edad en el Cantón ventanas Provincia de los ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Eloy se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas.
 Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá comprar los abonos, insumos y  semillas sin ningún tipo de problema.
Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes son: las plagas de langosta en el maíz. El sueño es que nunca le falte el trabajo para poder sobrevivir.
En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Eloy Irineo is 62 years old, single, and has two children. He lives with his family and children (ages 24 and 21) in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The Communal Bank “Dulce Sentimiento” (Sweet Feeling) is located in the Caimito II neighborhood in the parish of Puerto Pechiche in the canton of Pueblo Viejo. This Communal Bank consists of farmers who grow short-cycle crops such as corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Eloy engages in farming by growing corn, rice, and pigeon peas. His purchases and sales are conducted in the canton of Ventanas. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and farming supplies such as urea, herbicide, fertilizers, and weed killer so that he can keep his crops in good condition. This loan will be of great help because he can buy compost, supplies, and seeds without any type of problem.

The challenges he must face on a frequent basis include plagues of locusts that attack his corn crop. His dream is to lack nothing in his work so that he can survive.

In his free time, Eloy enjoys practicing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, herbicide, fertilizers, and weed killer.

loans.name: Diana Verónica

texts.es:
Diana Verónica tiene 24 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene tres hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 8, 3 y 1 año de edad en el Catón ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.
LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Diana se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
En la familia la relación ha mejorado porque ahora puede aportar un poco más para el bienestar de la familia, en el trabajo le va mucho mejor porque a aumentado la producción en los ingresos a mejorado mucho porque ahora con la venta de los productos obtiene más ingresos. 
El sueño es comprar terreno y hacerse una casa 
En los tiempos libres le gusta leer y escuchar las noticias.
texts.en:
Diana Verónica is 24 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has three children. She lives with her husband and children (ages 8, 3, and 1) in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The Communal Bank “Dulce Sentimiento” (Sweet Feeling) is located in the Caimito II neighborhood in the parish of Puerto Pechiche in the canton of Pueblo Viejo. This Communal Bank consists of farmers who grow short-cycle crops such as corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Diana engages in farming by growing corn, rice, and pigeon peas. Her purchases and sales are conducted in the canton of Ventanas. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and farming supplies such as urea, herbicide, fertilizers, and weed killer so that she can keep her crops in good condition.

Her family relations have improved because she can now provide a little more support toward the well-being of her family. In addition, her work will greatly improve because she can increase production. As a result, she can obtain a much better income because the sale of her products will lead to more profits.

Diana’s dream is to buy land and build a house. In her free time, she enjoys reading and listening to the news.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, herbicide, fertilizers, and weed killer.

loans.name: Susana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Susana de 45 años, una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones de crecer en su negocio.
Ella con el préstamo anterior pudo invertir un poco en su negocio ya que en la temporada de escolar con la ayuda de Dios pudo vender casi toda su mercadería que ella tenía en venta.
Ella se siente alegre al ver que su negocio crece cada día, ahora ella solicita un nuevo préstamo para la inversión de la misma y para abrir otro negocio que es la venta de pollo.
Su sueño es seguir con sus negocio y que su familia tenga un buen vivir.
texts.en:
Susana, age 45, is a hardworking woman how has many aspirations to grow her business. With her previous loan, she was able to invest a little bit in her business in time for the school year. She sold almost all of the merchandise that she had to offer, thanks to the help of God.
