She had worked as a seamstress for a long time and is now involved in sewing national goods that are in high demand among the local population.  Bubutay is a mother of seven children and a grandmother of 21 grandchildren.  In search of a financial source, her family started their own animal husbandry and farming business in 1995.  Thanks to her diligent work, Bubutay has two dairy cows, one calf, three work horses and a plot of land with potatoes and wheat in her household today.  In order to further develop her business, Bubutay requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company for the purchase of bulls.  Bubutay will invest part of the income from the loan into feeding livestock and part into house repairs.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Hotamchon

texts.ru: Хотамчон проживает в районе Рудаки. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Хотамчон имеет высшее образование, он работал прорабом. Сейчас Хотамчон таксист. Он предоставляет услугу. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 2 года. Кредит берет для оплаты за обучения сына.
texts.en: Hotamchon lives in the Rudaki district.  He is 41 years old, married and has four children.  Hotamchon has a higher education and used to work as a foreman.  Currently, Hotamchon is a taxi driver and provides a service.  He has been involved in this business for two years.  He is requesting this loan to pay for his son's education.

loans.use: to pay for education costs

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mère de sept enfants.Elle vit avec son mari et ses deux soeurs.Elle tient une boutique alimentaire(riz, huile,sucre, mil, arachide...) devant son domicile.Elle parvient à obtenir des bénéfices qui lui permettent d'améliorer la nourriture quotidienne de la famille et de satisfaire à ses propres besoins.Elle sollicite un pret de 300 000f pour acheter des produits alimentaires et renforcer ainsi son fonds de commerce.Son ambition est d'élargir son activité.
texts.en: The woman taking the loan is a mother of seven children. She lives with her husband and two sisters. She runs a business selling basic food items (rice, oil, sugar, millet, peanuts...) from her home. She hopes to have enough profits to improve the daily meals she provides her family and to satisfy other needs. She is requesting a loan of 300,000 cfa francs to purchase basic food stuffs and to strengthen the business' capital. Her goal is to increase the business' scope.

loans.use: to purchase basic food items

loans.name: Hamza

texts.ru: Хамза житель района Джиликул. Ему 40 лет. Он занимается растениеводством. Он в основном сеет пшеницу и выращивает овощи. Этим видом деятельности занимается 24 года. Кредит берет для закупа селитры и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Hamza is a resident of the Jilikul district.  He is 40 years.  Hamza is involved in agriculture and primarily sows wheat and grows vegetables.  He has been in this business for 24 years.  Hamza is requesting this loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Duterimbere/mgnz Group

texts.fr:
Jean fait partie du groupe Duterimbere/Muganza. Le nom du groupe signifie «Développer nous même». Il a 52 ans et il est marié avec 8 enfants de 10 à 30 ans, dont 8 scolarisés. Il a une autre personne en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 4 ans de primaire.

Jean est cultivateur de riz. C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire les semences sélectionnée. Dans les prochaines années, Jean voudrait être le fournisseur du riz dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Jean is a part of the group Duterimbere/Muganza. The name means something like "developing ourselves". He is 52 years old, married, and has 8 children between the ages of 10 and 30, 8 are in school. He also takes care of another person a part from his children. He has completed 4 years of schooling.

Jean is a rice farmer. It is his second round of financing with ACB. He is going to use the loan to purchase chemical fertilizer for his rice crops. 

His business growth strategy is to specially select the seeds he uses. In the next few years, Jean would like to become the main rice provider for his region. With the profits, he intends to educate and take care of his children.

loans.use: to purchase chemical fertilizer for his rice crops.

loans.name: Mody

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié qui vit avec son épouse et ses trois enfants.Depuis plus de trente ans , il exerce l'élevage traditionnelle, conduisant son troupeau à travers le pays, à la recherche de paturage et d'eau.Il y'a deux ans, il a changé de méthode d'élevage en adoptant l'embouche bovine.Ainsi, il achéte des boeufs  qu'il engraisse et revend au bout de 6 mois.Ce type d'élevage lui procure assez de revenus pour bien entretenir sa famille et constituer une petite épargne.Il sollicite un pret de 400000f pour acheter 3 boeufs.Son ambition est d'élargir son activité à la production et au commerce de lait.
texts.en: The man requesting the loan is married and lives with his wife and three children. For the past thirty years, he has raised cattle in the traditional way, leading his herd throughout the country-side in search of pasture and water. However, for the past two years, he changed his method to one that fatten the cattle more rapidly.  This means he purchases the cattle, fattens and resells them within 6-month cycles. This method allows him to make enough money to take good care of his family and save a little. He is requesting a loan of 400,000 cfa francs to purchase 3 cows. His goal is to increase his business activities to include the production and sales of milk.

loans.use: to purchase three cows

loans.name: Aïcha

texts.fr:
Aïcha est une femme âgée de 23 ans. Elle est mariée à un enseignant et est mère d‘un enfant de 2 ans.  
Aïcha travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2007. Elle achète et revend des bois de chauffe à toutes personnes à son domicile. Elle s’approvisionne régulièrement dans un village reculé du pays. Elle travaille seule. 
Aïcha a requis son quatrième  crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des bois de chauffe destinés à la vente. Elle pense réinvestir le surplus de profits dans le développement de son activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Aïcha voudrait voir son activité prospérer. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Aïcha is 23 years old. She is married to a teacher and has two children.
  
Aïcha has run her small business since 2007. She purchases and then resells firewood to people at their homes. She buys her stocks from a remote village. She works alone. 
Aïcha is requesting her fourth loan from WAGES to purchase firewood for resale. She intends to reinvest her profits into the business.
In the next few years, Aïcha would like to see her business grow. She says that with her profits, she intends to have a happy family.

loans.use: to purchase firewood

loans.name: Guljamila

texts.ru: Гулжамиле 49 лет, замужем и имеет 5 детей.   После распада Советского Союза, семья Гулжамилы получила земельный надел, ставший первым вкладом в семейный бизнес в полеводстве и животноводстве. На сегодняшний день, семья выращивает картофель и фасоль на 3,72 га поливной земли , и параллельно занимается разведением скота, получая прибыль от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулжамила обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы и баранов. Доходы Гулжамила планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Guljamila is 49 years old, married and has five children.  After the break-up of the Soviet Union, Guljamila's family received a plot of land, which became the first investment into the family business of farming and animal husbandry.  Today, the family grows potatoes and beans on a 3.72 hectares of arable land and is also involved in breeding livestock and receiving a profit from sales of dairy and meat products.  In order to further develop her business, Guljamila requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for the purchase of cattle and sheep.  Guljamila plans to use the income into increasing livestock quantity further.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and sheep

loans.name: Twiyubakebahinzi Group

texts.fr:
Ananie fait partie du groupe Twiyubake Bahinzi. Le nom du groupe signifie «renforçons-nous agriculteurs». Il a 30 ans et il est marié avec 4 enfants de 5 à 9 ans, dont 3 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est de 3 ans de primaire.

Ananie est cultivateur de riz. C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire les semences sélectionnée. Dans les prochaines années, Ananie voudrait être le fournisseur du riz dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ananie is part of the group Twiyubake Bahinzi. The name means something like "strengthening farmers". He is 30 years old, married and has four children between the ages of 5 and 9, 3 are in school. He has 3 years of schooling.

Ananie is a rice farmer. It is his second round of financing with ACB. He is going to use the loan to purchase chemical fertilizer for his rice crops.

His business growth strategy is to only use specially selected seeds. In the next few years, Ananie would like to become the main rice producer in his region. With his profits, he intends to educate and take care of his children.

loans.use: to purchase chemical fertilizer for his rice crops.

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru: Манзура проживает в городе Исфара. Ей 33 года. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Манзура занимается торговлей сухофруктов. Этим видом деятельности занимается три года. Кредит берет для покупки кураги.
texts.en: Manzura lives in the town of Isfara.  She is 33 years old, married and has two children.  Manzura is involved in sales of dried fruits and has been in this business for three years.  She is requesting this loan for the purchase of dried apricots.

loans.use: to purchase dried apricots

loans.name: Kilelu

texts.en:
Kilelu is 33 years old. He is married and a father of three, all in schooling. He is a farmer and he does the farming on his own piece of land, which he has been doing for the last fifteen years.

He learned about KADET LTD through a registered client. He has been a good client and this will be his first loan. Hhe is planning to spend the loan procees to purchase agricultural products, i.e maize seeds, fertilizers and also to hire manpower to aid in the farming activities.

Kilelu hopes to use the profits from the proceeds of this loan to expand his farming activities from small scale to commercial farming. He is a hard working man who is determined to achieve his set goals.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural products.

loans.name: Lantano

texts.en:
Lantano is 27 years old. He is married and is a father of one child. He has been farming for the last seven years. His farm is in a productive area which has proved to be good for mixed farming.

Lantano learned about KADET through a marketing campaign done by KADET LTD staff in his area of residence. This will be his first loan. He is planning to buy wheat seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies. 

He hopes to use the profit from this loan to build a new house and to educate his children. His hope and dream is to buy and build a rental premise. He is an energetic man who can do more, if supported financially.

loans.use: to buy wheat seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Raeli

texts.en:
Raeli is a very hard working lady who has practiced mixed farming for over five years. She is 40 years old, married and has three children.

She is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD. She plans to use part of the loan amount to buy farm inputs. She intends to use the additional income from the proceeds of this loan to buy cattle for fattening and to pay her children school fees. She hopes to develop her business and to be financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr: Cet emprunteur est marié et père de deux enfants.Il vient de solder après seulement 5 mois un second pret de l'UIMCEC de 350000f qui devait durer 12 mois.L'Institution, conformément à sa politique de crédit, lui a laissé les intérets des 7 mois restants.Il exerce dans le mareyage en achetant du poisson dans sa localité pour approvisionner des usines situées dans la capitale.Cette activité lui permet de prendre en charge l'entretien de sa famille et de subvenir à ses propres besoins.Aujourdhui, il sollicite un troisième pret de 500000f pour acheter 10 caisses de poisson.Son ambition est de se lancer dans l'import export.
texts.en: This borrower is a married father of two. He just repaid after only 5 months a second loan from UIMCEC of 35,000 f, which was supposed to last for 12 months. The institution, according to its loan policy, forgave the interest for the remaining 7 months. He is in the fish-trading business, buying fish locally to supply to factories in the capital. This business allows him to take care of his family and to meet his own needs. Today, he is seeking a third loan of 500,000 f to buy 10 crates of fish. His ambition is to get into the import-export business.

loans.use: to buy 10 crates of fish

loans.name: Wesley

texts.en:
Wesley is 29 years, married, has two children. He is a farmer and he does the farming on his own piece of land, which he has been doing for the last six years.

Wesley is requesting his first loan, which he will use to prepare land for maize and wheat planting. The two crops has been doing well in his area due to good climatic conditions. He learned about KADET LTD from the registered KADET groups.  

Wesley hopes to use the profits from the proceeds of this loan to improve the living standards of his family, to provide for the education of his children, and to expand his business. His dream is prosper in the business of tomato farming. He is a hard working man who is determined to achieve his set goals.

loans.use: to prepare land for maize and wheat planting.

loans.name: Abduvahob

texts.ru: Абдувахоб проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. У них один ребенок. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он имеет среднее образование. Предоставляет услугу по маршруту Турсунзаде-Шахринав. Он таксист. В этой области Абдувахоб восемь лет. Он берет кредит для приобретения запасных частей и ремонта автомашины.
texts.en: Abduvahob lives in the town of Tursun-zoda.  He is 25 years old, married and has one child.  His wife is a homemaker.  Abduvahob has a secondary education.  He is a taxi driver and provides a taxi service along the Tursun-zoda - Shahrinav route.  Abduvahob has been in this business for eight years.  He is requesting this loan for the purchase of spare parts and repair of his car.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and repair his car

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Benard is 25 years old and single; he supports his parents. He  is a farmer and he has been farming  for the last four years. His farm is in a productive area, which has proved to be good for wheat farming.

Benard is requesting his first loan, which he will use to prepare his wheat farming.  His farm normally does well due to good climatic conditions n his area. He learned about KADET  LTD through a marketing campaign done by KADET staff in his area of residence. 

Benard hopes to use the profit from this loan to educate his children and to acquire more land for farming so that he can increase his wheat production. His hope is to become a large scale farmer and buy a bigger piece of land. He is an energetic man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: to prepare his wheat farming.

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann is a very hard-working woman who has practiced mixed farming for more than six years. She is 37 years old, married, and has three children. She is applying for her first loan. She plans to use part of the loan amount to buy farm inputs and the other part to run a dairy milk shop. 

She intends to use the additional income from the proceeds of this loan to buy cattle for fattening and to pay her children's school fees. She hopes to develop her business and to be financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs

loans.name: Esperance

texts.en: Esperance is 31 years old and has four children between the ages of 6 and 11. All of her children are in school. She is married to a man who works at a gas station. Esperance sells vegetables such as tomatoes, carrots, onions, and eggplants in a store she has run for four years. She would like a loan to increase her inventory of vegetables. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business. She would love to see her business grow every day.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Emerthe

texts.en: Emerthe is 36 years old with three children aged 6 to 12 years. All of them are currently in school. She is married to a technician. Emerthe sells cooking oil, rice, flour, and other goods in a store she has been running for five years. She would like a loan to expand her inventory and add a more diverse selection to her store. Any profits will be used to renovate her house. She would like to become a self-sustaining businesswoman in the future.

loans.use: To buy more cooking oil and rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new construction equipment.

loans.name: Ndéye Ndoubé

texts.fr: L'empreunreuse est une femme mariée qui vit avec son mari et ses cinq enfants.Elle mène une activité de commerce de tissus et d'articles de mercerie.Elle s'approvisionne dans les marchés hebdomadaires de la  capitale du pays et revend ses produits dans sa localité.L'activité lui procure des revenus qui lui permettent de prendre en charge ses besoins ainsi que les dépenses liées à la scolarisation et à la santé de ses enfants.Elle participe aussi à la prise en charge de l'alimentation de sa famille. Elle sollicite un pret de 300000F pour acheter des tissus "thioub" ainsi que des produits divers de mercerie et d'habillement.Son ambition est de construire sa proptre maison.
texts.en: The borrower is a married woman who lives with her husband and five children. She sells fabric and dry goods. She stocks up at the weekly markets in the country’s capital and resells her products locally. The business earnings allow her to take care of her needs, as well as the expenses for her children’s schooling and health. She also helps to pay for her family’s food. She is seeking a loan for 300,000 f to buy “thioub” fabric, as well as diverse dry goods and clothing. Her ambition is to buy her own house.

loans.use: to buy "thioub" fabric, as well as diverse dry goods and clothing

loans.name: Mostafa

texts.en: Mostafa is a 28-year-old single Lebanese man living with one parent and a sibling. Despite his young age, he chose to work as a painter four years ago in order to cover his family’s expenses. Today, he is a freelance painter. He’s asking to borrow 1,100 USD from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new tools to properly do his job. In the future, he plans to enlarge his business by taking more Kiva loans and therefore be able to save enough money to get married.

loans.use: to purchase new tools

loans.name: Aaron

texts.en:
This is 38-year-old Aaron from Aberdeen, the western area in Freetown. He is married with two children, ages 1 year 4 months and 4 years. He has two additional dependents at home.   

Aaron runs a general merchandise store in Aberdeen he sells toothpaste, assorted drinks, and sardines. He has been running this business for 14 years.  He also receives income from his wife, who works as a nurse in a military hospital. Her salary contributes to pay for household expenses.  He says that the main challenge to his business is not having sufficient capital to run his store. 

Aaron has requested a loan in order to buy more assorted drinks and provisions. The extra income from this loan will allow him to develop his business and have quick turnover. In the future, he plans to expand his business more. He appreciates your support.

loans.use: To purchase more assorted drinks, sardines and other provisions.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 20-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and two siblings. He has a big interest in motorcycles. This is why he started his business in 2007, working as a motorcycle mechanic. Ali states that he really loves his job. And today, he’s asking for a loan of $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new mechanical equipment such as screwdriver, hammer, handtools and many other supplies in order to facilitate his business operations. In the future, he plans to expand his business and earn more profit so he can open his own motorcycle showroom one day.

loans.use: purchase new mechanical equipment such as screwdriver, hammer, handtools and many other supplies

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is 33 years old. He is a married father of two children. He is a farmer and he has been doing this for the last five years. His farm is in a productive area that has proved to be good for wheat farming. He learned about KADET through KADET staff members in his area of residence. 

This is Nicholas' first loan. He plans to use the loan to prepare his wheat farming, which normally does well in his area due to good climatic conditions. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to acquire more land for farming to increase his wheat production as well as educate his children. 

His hope and dream is to become a large-scale farmer and buy a bigger piece of land and build a plot. He is a young and energetic man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: to acquire more land for farming.

loans.name: Natia

texts.en:
Natia lives in the village of Urbnisi, Kareli district. She is 42 years old, married and lives with her family: her husband – Zurab, her  19-year-old son, and her parents (retired). Natia works as a teacher in a local school. Her husband is the head of  the farming business of the family. 

Alongside her main job, Natia is busy with a trade business. She has a small grocery store in the village. She rented space and opened this store two years ago. She brings grocery products from Tbilisi (the capital of the country) and sells them in the store. The customers of the store are mainly the village population. 

Zurab is heading up the farming activities of the family. The family owns 3 hectares of land, where maize, beets and onions are grown. Harvested crops are sold locally. The total average monthly income of the family is 1000 Laris (approximately 600 USD), including Natia’s parents’ pensions.

Natia requested credit for purchasing grocery products for the store. She will increase her stock in trade and offer a wider assortment of products to her customers. It will increase the sales and thus the income of the family. Natia will use the ncreased income for improving family living conditions.

loans.use: to increase stock in trade in grocery store.

loans.name: Ruth Elena

texts.es:
A sus 39 años de edad Ruth es una mujer emprendedora que ha luchado con gran esmero para sacar adelante a sus 7 hijos, actualmente tiene su propio negocio, una tienda en la que trabaja día a día con la ilusión de tener un progreso notable.

Ruth sueña con que sus hijos sean profesionales y es conciente que para ello debe seguir trabajando con la misma tenacidad que hasta ahora para que su negocio crezca, por esto hoy tiene la motivación de solicitar un crédito, el cual invertirá en surtido para la tienda, pues tener variedad, calidad y cantidad es clave para la mejoría de las ventas, y en este momento no cuenta con el capital necesario para la compra de Gaseosas, legumbres y snaks.
texts.en:
At the age of 39, Ruth Elena is an enterprising woman who has worked with much dedication to raise her seven children.  She currently has a business of her own: a grocery store that she works in day to day hoping to make notable progress.

Ruth dreams with her children becoming professionals and she’s aware that to do so she must continue working with the same tenacity she’s had to date so that the business will grow.  Because of this, today she’s motivated to request a loan that she’ll use to buy stock merchandise for the store because having variety, quality and quantity is the key for improving sales and she currently lacks the necessary capital to buy soft-drinks, vegetables and snacks.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and general merchandise to stock her store

loans.name: Abdul

texts.en:
Meet 36-year-old Abdul from Calabatown. He is married with three children between the ages of 3 years and 11 years. He has four additional dependents that live with him because they are his relatives from the village. Two of his children are currently attending school. 

 In 2001, Abdul established his general merchandise business. He began his business because he wanted to generate more income.  He also earns income from renting out a house. He says that the main challenge to his business is price inflation.

Abdul requires a loan in order to buy more cement, assorted drinks, provisions and bottled water. He hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow him to improve his standard of living. In the future, Abdul plans to expand his business more. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more cement, assorted drinks, provisions and bottled water.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is a 24-year-old single Lebanese man living with his parents and one sibling. In addition to the family's main income from his father, Hassan's is also considered as an important source of financial earnings. 

He has been working in floor covering and bricks for the past eight years and he's way too good. He works independently and has his own and loyal customers. Today, he's asking to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new supplies. He notes that this will help him serve more customers and therefore increase his profits by 10%.

loans.use: to purchase new supplies

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter, age 33, is married and supports seven people in the family. He has been in farming for the past four years. He is a humble client. He learned of KADET through other clients registered in his area of dwelling. This will be his first loan from KADET LTD. With the loan, he intends to prepare his land for farming and purchase maize seeds.

The anticipated profit generated will be put back into the farm. Peter dreams of being a big farmer. He can do more if provided with resources.

loans.use: to prepare his land for the planting season and buy maize seeds.

loans.name: Verene

texts.en: Verene is 35 years old and married with two children aged 1 and 8. She sells foodstuffs in a store that she has run for 10 years. She would like a loan to buy more foodstuffs to sell. Any profits will be used to provide for her family. Verene would like to see her store expand in the future.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs to sell.

loans.name: Dynamique Group

texts.fr: LWAMIRA Pélagie est présidente du groupe de crédit dynamique , cliente au 7eme cycle de crédit, mariée, mère de trois enfants dont le dernier est en première année de graduat  et 2 sont déjà mariés. Elle vend des articles divers notamment des couvertures, draps, des ustensiles de cuisine…Elle commença son commerce en 1997 avec l’aide de son mari  en vendant des légumineuses (haricot, petit poids…). Elle sollicite un crédit de 300$ pour renforcer son chiffre d’affaire en achetant une quantité importante d’ustensiles de cuisine, des couvertures…Elle remercie l’IMF HEKIMA pour les crédits qu’elle reçoit sans garantie matérielle car elle a pu scolarisée tous ces trois enfants et elle projette acheter une parcelle dans l’avenir.
texts.en:
LWAMIRA Pélagie is the president of the loan group Dynamique, She is a client on her seventh loan cycle and the married mother of three children. The last-born is a first-year graduate student, and the two of the children are already married. 

Pélagie sells a variety of items, notably blankets, bed sheets, kitchen utensils.... She started this business in 1997, with her husband's help, by selling legumes (beans, peas...) 

She is requesting a loan of $300 to bolster her sales by buying a major quantity of kitchen utensils, blankets.... 

Pélagie thanks the micro-finance institution HEKIMA for the loans she receives without needing collateral because she was able to provide schooling to all her children. She plans on buying a parcel of land in the future.

loans.use: kitechen utensils, blankets....

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Leonard

texts.en:
Leonard is 28 years old. He is married and a father of one child. He is a farmer and he does the farming on his own piece of land which he has been doing for the last six years.

He learned about KADET LTD through a registered client. He has been a good client and this will be his first loan which he is planning to spend to purchase agricultural inputs, i.e., maize seeds, fertilizers and also hire manpower to  aid him on the farm. 

He hopes to use the profit from the proceeds of this loan to expand his farming activity from small-scale to commercial farming. His dream is do large-scale farming and attain financial independence. He is a hard-working man who is determined to achieve his set goals.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Abu

texts.en:
Abu is 32 years old and married with two children, ages 2 years and 6 years. He runs a provisions store in Calabatown, in the eastern area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. He also takes care of two relatives at home.

He's been in this business for six years and sells drinks, pure water and other provisions at his store. His business is the only source of income he has. Abu says that the main challenge to his business is price inflation.

He requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy more provisions. He says that the extra income from this loan will help him improve his standard of living. In the future, Abu would like to expand his business more. He is grateful for your support.

loans.use: To purchase more drinks, pure water, and other provisions.

loans.name: Kassem

texts.en:
Kassem is a 27-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and seven siblings. He is supportive to his family especially with the heavy cost of living and expenses. 

Kassem is an expert in floor covering; he has been working in this occupation for the past 17 years. Today, he’s requesting to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase needed tools and supplies to be able to satisfy his customers' demand. In that way, he will be capable of increasing his business profits. In the future, he plans to work on projects inside and outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase needed tools and supplies.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a very hard-working woman who has practiced mixed farming for over five years. She is 29 years old and married and they have two children.

She is applying for her first loan. She plans to use part of the loan amount to buy farm inputs and the rest for a small restaurant business. 

She intends to use the additional income from the proceeds of this loan to buy cattle for fattening and to pay her children's school fees. She hopes to develop her business and to be financially stable in the future

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Ramón De Jesús

texts.es: Ramón de Jesús hace más de 25 años descubrió un arte que hasta ahora le ayuda para vivir. El trabajo con materiales como la Guadua y la Cabuya, hacen que este gran emprendedor demuestre las ganas y el entusiasmo en cada trabajo que realiza en su pequeño local desde hace 4 años que tiene su propio negocio. Con las ganas de poderle seguir ayudando a su madre, ya muy anciana, este gran emprendedor y hábil artesano invertirá el préstamo en la compra de la guadua y la cabuya, materia prima necesaria para poder cumplirle a sus clientes de manera eficiente y a tiempo.
texts.en: 25 years ago, Ramón de Jesús discovered an art which, up to now, has helped him to survive.  He works with materials such as bamboo and pita fiber.  This great entrepreneur shows his desire and enthusiasm in every work of art that he creates in his small premises in which he has run his own business for four years now.  With the desire to continue helping his mother, who is now very old, this great entrepreneur and talented artist will invest his loan in buying bamboo and pita fiber.  These are the raw materials that he needs to meet his customers' demands efficiently and on time.

loans.use: to buy work materials such as bamboo and pita fiber

loans.name: Batoul

texts.en:
Batoul, a 39-year-old Lebanese woman living with her husband and school-aged child, is the main income-earner for her family. The owner of a clothing shop since 2009, she works hard to pay her son’s educational fees and other family expenses.

Batoul is planning to enlarge her shop to increase her sales and income, and so is requesting a loan of $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy more clothing for her shop. She notes that this will help her improve the family's standard of living, and in the future she plans to open several branches of her shop in different areas of the city.

loans.use: to buy more clothing for her shop.

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en: Adnan, a 30-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and three siblings, has been working as a farmer for the past 13 years, cultivating vegetables according to the season. Adnan is requesting a loan of $2000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase fertilizers to increase his agricultural productivity and perform  needed maintenance on the canal to ensure sufficient water for his crops to grow well. In the future, he plans to expand by cultivating fruits in addition to vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and perform needed maintenance on the water canal.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 27 years old. He is married and is a father of one child. He is a farmer and he has been doing this for the last seven years. His farm is in a productive area which has proved to be good for mixed farming.

He learned about KADET through a marketing campaign done by KADET LTD staff in his area of residence. This will be his first loan which he is planning to use to buy wheat seeds, fertilizers, and other farm supplies. 

He hopes to use the profit from this loan to build a new house and educate his children. His hope and dream is to buy or build rental premises. He is an energetic man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: to buy wheat seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Maricela

texts.es:
Desde hace dos años y medio Maricela, una mujer de 28 años y madre de tres hijos, decidió dedicarse a la venta de mercancía para apoyar a su esposo en la generación de ingresos y así ofrecerle un futuro más digno a sus pequeños hijos, quienes a su corta edad ya ven en su madre al fiel ejemplo de la mujer emprendedora, que lucha por alcanzar un mejor porvenir para su familia. Su mayor anhelo es tener un almacén acondicionado de la mejor manera para ofrecerle el mejor servicio a sus familiares, vecinos y amigos, quienes hasta el momento se han dejado cautivar por el surtido que esta microempresaria les ofrece.

En la actualidad, Maricela requiere recursos económicos para comprar mercancía y así ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de prendas de vestir, con lo cual tendrá la posibilidad de vender más y generar los ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Two and a half years ago, Maricela, a 28-year-old woman and mother of three children, decided to sell merchandise to help her husband generate income and provide a more proper future for her little children who at their young age already see in their mother a good example of an enterprising woman who strives to reach a better future for her family.  Her greatest wish is to have a store that is equipped in the best way possible to offer the best service to her relatives, neighbors and friends who to date have let themselves be charmed by the selection of merchandise this micro businesswoman offers.

At present, Maricela needs economic resources to buy merchandise to offer her customers a greater variety of articles of clothing so that she’ll have the possibility of selling more and generating income to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Tina

texts.en:
Tina is from the village of Kindzati, Kartli Region, East Georgia. She is 65 years old and lives with her family: her 44-year-old son, her daughter-in-law, and three grandchildren who are 16, 22, and 23. The main source of the income for Tina’s family is agriculture. They have two milk cows and Tina produces cheese that she sells to local dairy retailers. Along with the dairy farm, the family owns 4.5 hectares of land where they grow wheat, maize, beans, garlic, and onions. The family sells their harvested products locally. Tina also runs a small grocery store in the village and her granddaughter works there as a salesperson. 

Tina is requesting a loan to purchase two milk cows. This will enable her to produce and sell 100% more cheese and will significantly increase the income of the family. Also, small part of her loan (up to 20%) will be used for purchasing merchandise for the family grocery store to expand the offerings and increase sales. 

Tina plans to use her increased profit to purchase necessary household goods to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase two milk cows

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a very hard-working woman who has been a mixed farmer for the past three years. She rears animals, sells milk, and also does horticultural farming. She is 33 years old, married, and they have three children.

She is applying for her first loan. She plans to use the loan amount to buy farm inputs. She intends to use the additional income from the proceeds of this loan to buy cattle for fattening and to pay her children's school fees. She hopes to develop her business and to be financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en:
Harriet lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has six children who all go to school. She has no additional family members. 

She sells passion fruit on a retail basis at the market. She also makes passion fruit juice. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of passion fruit. She gets additional income through her video library. Her goals and aspirations are to become a wholesaler, to build more commercial houses, and to educate her children up to university level. 

Her major business challenges are seasonality and transportation. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees, rent, and food.

loans.use: To buy more bags of passion fruit

loans.name: Rami

texts.en:
Rami is a 23-year-old single man who lives with his parents and four siblings. In 2010, Rami decided to start his own coffee shop in order to supplement the family's income and help his parents with the high cost of living. 

Rami is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from the Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a coffee machine. This machine will help him attract more customers and therefore add to his profits. In the future, Rami plans to enlarge his business and start selling quick meals.

loans.use: to purchase a coffee machine

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is 51 years old and is a widow. She has six children, four of whom are currently in school. She sells vegetables in a market, which she has been doing for 10 years. Jacqueline would like a loan to buy more peas, carrots, and beans to sell at the market. 

She will save the profits with the goal of expanding her business.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables for resale

loans.name: Zurelly  Antonia

texts.es: Con su anterior credikiva, Zurelly compró un lavacabezas y tambien productos para surtir su negocio. Ella se encuentra muy satisfecha y espera hacer una nueva inversión en insumos para su salon de belleza infantil, porque vienen las fiestas decembrinas y su volumen de ventas aumentará y debe estar preparada; en la actualidad está aplicando a su segundo credikiva y con el comprará insumsos como gel, laca, tintes, adornos para peinados en mayor volumen, asi ganará descuentos y tendra en existencia todo lo necesario para responder con calidad a sus clientes infantes y a sus madres que desean verlo elegantes para las fiestas que se avecinan.
texts.en: Zuelly used her previous Kiva loan to buy a hair washing sink and also products to stock her salon.  She is very satisfied and hopes to make a new investment in her children’s beauty salon because the December festivities are approaching and her volume of sales will increase and she must be prepared.  She is applying for her second Kiva loan to buy supplies like gel, lacquer, coloring and hair decorations in larger amounts so that she’ll qualify for discounts and to have on hand everything she needs to respond to the demand of her children customers and their mothers who want to see them elegant for the approaching festivities.

loans.use: to buy beauty salon supplies in larger amounts.

loans.name: Jassar

texts.en:
Jassar is 25 years old. He is a single Lebanese man who lives with his parents and one sibling. For the past 11 years, he has been working as a carpenter. He is very professionA. at his work and he is striving for a better life.

Jassar is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from the Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase necessary carpentry equipment that will improve his work. In the future, he plans to take another Kiva loan and do his best to meet all of his customer’s demands
.

loans.use: to purchase carpentry equipment

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José Antonio es un hombre luchador que desde muy joven ha sabido lo que es ganarse la vida a partir del trabajo honesto y dedicado.  Hoy, cuando ya alcanza los 57 años de edad, tomó como opción de vida dedicarse a la producción agropecuaria mediante el cultivo de hortalizas, oficio que le ha permitido obtener los recursos económicos para vivir dignamente.

Con el objetivo de seguir generando los ingresos que requiere, José Antonio necesita un capital de inversión que destinará para la compra de abonos y semillas; de esta forma, podrá cultivar una nueva producción y cubrir sus necesidades básicas de subsistencia.
texts.en:
José Antonio is a hardworking man who has earned his living from a very young age through honest and dedicated work.  Today, having reached the age of 57, he decided to make a life choice and go into vegetable farming, an occupation that has allowed him to earn economic resources to live with dignity.

With the objective of continuing to generate the resources he requires, José Antonio needs investment capital to buy manure and seeds so that he can start a new crop and cover his basic survival needs.

loans.use: to buy manure and seeds.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has four children, three of whom go to school. She has no additional family members. 

She owns a retail shop. She also sells charcoal as an additional source of income. She has been in this business for over ten years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from MCDT SACCO with which she wants to buy more bags of charcoal. Her goals and aspirations are to buy a motor van to ease transport costs and become a charcoal supplier at the market. 

Her major business challenges are seasonality and transportation. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees, rent and food.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Kipailoi

texts.en:
Kipailoi is 37 years old. He is married and together they have three children. He is a farmer and he has been doing this for the last seven years. 

His farm is in a productive area, which has proven to be good for mixed farming. He learned about KADET through a marketing campaign done by KADET staff in his area of dwelling. He has no credit history with any other MFI and this will be his first loan, which he is planning to use to buy seeds, fertilizers and prepare his land for planting. 

He will also use the loan to buy pesticides and for weeding. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to build a new house and educate his children.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and prepare his land for planting.

loans.name: Francisco Luis

texts.es:
Desde muy niño Francisco supo lo que es carecer de los recursos económicos para tener una niñez tranquila, situación que lo llevó a muy corta edad a trabajar en la venta de verduras.  Actualmente, tiene 30 años y con la experiencia adquirida durante dos décadas de trabajo imparable, ha logrado posicionarse entre los clientes que ya lo reconocen por ser proveedor de tomates, pepinos, pimentones y aguacates frescos, en la plaza de mercado del Municipio de Rionegro – Antioquia.

En este momento, Francisco tiene la necesidad de comprar surtido para su negocio, así como canastas en las cuales pueda exhibir sus productos; sin embargo, carece de los recursos económicos para acceder a ellos.  Está convencido, de que al contar con el capital que requiere, podrá satisfacer mejor las necesidades de sus clientes y, por supuesto, tener más ingresos para vivir mejor.
texts.en:
Since childhood, Francisco knew what it was like to lack economic resources to have a tranquil childhood, a situation that pushed him from a very young age into working selling vegetables.  Currently, he’s been working for 30 years and with the experience he’s gained over two decades of non-stop work he’s managed to position himself among customers who recognize him as a supplier of fresh tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers and avocadoes in the town market in Rionegro, Antiquia.

At present, Francisco needs to buy a supply for his business as well as baskets to display his products.  However, he lacks the economic resources to do so.  He’s convinced that if he had the capital he needs he’d be able to better meet his customers’ needs and, of course, have more income to live better.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise and baskets for the vegetables.

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en: Aisha lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children and all go to school. She has no additional family members. She owns a poultry farm at her home. She has been in business for the last 10 years. She works six days a week. She has requested a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of chicken feed. She generates additional income through brick laying and renting rooms. Her goals and aspirations are to own 2,000 chickens and to own a delivery van to ease on transportation costs. Her major business challenges are seasonality and transportation of chicken feed. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more bags of chicken feed

loans.name: Fredy Alonso

texts.es:
Fredy es un hombre de 31 años, dedicado a transportar todo tipo de mercancía, trasteos, productos agrícolas y material de construcción, gracias a su vehículo de tracción animal. Su mayor sueño es tener varios coches y caballos para generar empleo para su familia, para quien anhela una mejor calidad de vida.

En este momento necesita acceder a un crédito para comprar otro coche y otro caballo y así, además de mejorar los ingresos familiares, tendrá la posibilidad de brindarle empleo a uno de sus hermanos menores, quien se encuentra desempleado y también requiere empezar a producir para obtener su propio sustento.
texts.en:
Fredy’s a 31-year-old man who works transporting all sorts of merchandise: furniture, farm products, building supplies thanks to his animal powered wagon.  His greatest dream is to have several wagons and horses to generate employment for his family that he wants to provide a better quality of life for.

At present, he needs access to a loan to buy another wagon and another horse so that besides improving his family income he will be able to provide employment for one of his younger brothers who is unemployed and needs to start producing to support himself.

loans.use: to buy a wagon and a horse.

loans.name: Adama

texts.en:
Meet 40-year-old Adama who lives in Kissy, an eastern area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. She is married with two children, ages 10 and 25. She also takes care of two relatives at home.  Adama established her general merchandise business in 2006. She began her business because she wanted to generate enough income to support her family and she says she has not encountered any business problems yet.  Adama also receives income from her relatives overseas. 

Adama is requesting a loan to buy more cement, bags of flour, and soft drinks. She hopes that the extra income from her loan will allow her to increase her business and support her family and dependents. In the future, Adama plans to expand her business and become a supplier. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy flour, cement, and soft drinks

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: Orlando vive al sur occidente de la ciudad de Barranquilla, con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en las edades de 4 a 8 años. Allí en este mismo barrio tiene una llantería donde ofrece los servicios de mantenimiento y reparación de llantas de vehículos. Su experiencia data desde el año 1996 cuando fue ayudante en un negocio similar al que ahora tiene desde hace un año, cuando decidió independizarse y comprar poco a poco herramientas y equipos para lanzar su emprendimiento al mercado.  Sus metas son progresar en esta activad, para generar ingresos importantes con los que logre el bienestar de su familia especialmente de sus hijos en el tema educativo, ofreciéndoles una formación de calidad, que les permita ser exitosos. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, a través de su credikiva, con el cual comprará llantas y neumáticos para aumentar su inventario.  En la actualidad su rentabilidad promedia es no menor del 37% indicador financiero  desde el cual planea su crecimiento.
texts.en:
Orlando lives in the south of the city of Barranquilla with his spouse and three children whose ages range from 4 to 8 years.  He has a tire repair shop in the same neighborhood where he provides vehicle tire repair and service.  His experience dates back to 1996 when he worked as a helper in a business similar to the one he has now and he decided to become independent and gradually purchased tools and equipment to launch his enterprise into the marketplace.

His goals are to make progress in this occupation to generate sizable income to attain the wellbeing of his family, especially his children with respect to their education providing one of quality for them that will lead to their success.

He is currently applying for his first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo through Kiva that he’ll use to buy tires and inner tubes to increase his inventory.  His present profit margin is no less than 37%, a financial indicator from which he projects his growth.

loans.use: to buy tires and inner tubes.

loans.name: Maribelcy

texts.es:
Con 37 años de edad, casada y madre de 3 hijos, Maribelcy se dedica a la elaboración de comidas para fiestas y eventos; oficio que aprendió luego de que la necesidad la llevó a pensar cómo apoyar a su esposo en la generación de ingresos para la familia. Motivada entonces por este deseo, aprendió a cocinar ayudándole a una amiga y al ver que aprendía muy rápido, decidió embarcarse en la aventura de ser microempresaria.

Además de atender los eventos, esta mujer creativa acude a otras alternativas para obtener el sustento, como lo es la elaboración de empanadas y morcillas que les provee quincenalmente a clientes que ya conocen las mieles de su sazón. 

Contar con muy poco capital para su negocio, no ha sido un obstáculo para mantenerse firme en su intento de salir adelante.  A pesar de ello, en este momento requiere los recursos económicos para comprar un horno e implementos para la cocina.  Realizar esta inversión será clave para mejorar sus condiciones de trabajo y atender con mayor calidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
At the age of 37, married and the mother of three children, Maribelcy makes food for parties and events, an occupation she leaned when need forced her to think up a way to help her husband generate family income.  Motivated then by this desire, she learned to cook helping a girlfriend and when she noticed that she was a quick learner she decided to throw herself into the adventure of becoming a micro businesswoman.

Besides catering events, this creative woman turns to other alternatives to obtain income like making empanadas [turnovers] and morcillas [blood sausages] that she sells bi-weekly to customers who are cognizant of her special touch with seasoning.

Having little capital for her business has not been an obstacle for her to stand firm in her intention to get ahead.  Despite that however, at present she needs economic resources to buy an oven and some kitchen utensils.  Making this investment will be key to improving her working conditions and providing better quality for her customers.

loans.use: to buy an oven, pots and various utensils.

loans.name: Alhaji

texts.en:
Alhaji is 32 years old and married with a 12-year-old child who is currently attending school. For the past five years, he has run a general merchandise store in Grassfield, in the eastern area of Freetown, Sierra Leone. Alhaji sells books, pens, milk, butter, sugar, and assorted other goods. His major business challenge is slow business during the rainy season.

Alhaji is requesting a loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more books, pens, and provisions to sell.  The extra income from his loan will help him improve and maintain good health. In the future, Alhaji would like to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase books, pens, milk, butter and other items to sell

loans.name: Justine

texts.en: Justine lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed with two children and only one child goes to school. She takes care of one additional family member (mother). She operates a retail shop at the market. She also bakes chapatti as her other source of income. She has been in this business for the last 10 years.  She works seven days a week .She has requested for a loan of 1,100,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of rice, sugar, maize flour, and cooking oil. Her goals and aspirations are to expand her shop into a supermarket. Her major business challenges are seasonality, off and on electricity and transportation. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and utility bills.

loans.use: To buy more bags of sugar, rice, maize flour and cooking oil

loans.name: Luz Estrella

texts.es:
Luz Estrella, es una mujer emprendedora y echada para adelante que a sus 31 años de edad, día tras día se levanta para abrir su tienda y así ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus dos hijos de 8 y 11 años.

El negocio en el que vende víveres y abarrotes, hoy requiere mayor inversión, puesto que así podrá ofrecerle más alternativas de surtido a sus clientes y garantizar que la sigan prefiriendo a ella, antes que a la competencia que tanto le ha venido afectando.

De acceder a los recursos económicos que tanto está necesitando, los invertirá en la compra de estanterías para exhibir de manera más atractiva sus productos y en un mejor surtido para su tienda.
texts.en:
Luz Estrella is an entrepreneurial woman who strives to get ahead in life.  At 31 years of age, she gets up early every day in order to open her store and thereby offer a better quality of life to her two children who are 8 and 11 years old.  

In her business, Luz Estrella sells food and groceries.  She currently needs to make a greater investment in her business as this will enable her to offer more stock to her customers and ensure that they remain loyal to her business rather than to the competition which has been affecting her.

With access to the financial resources that she so needs, Luz Estrella will invest her loan in buying shelves on which to display her products more attractively and in better stocking her store.

loans.use: to buy shelves and merchandise

loans.name: Alpha   Umaru

texts.en:
Meet 27-year-old Alpha from Calabatown, a single man who takes care of one relative at home. In 2003, Alpha established his pharmacy as a permanent source of income. He says that his main business challenge is ever-rising transportation costs.

Alpha is now requesting a loan to buy more medicines such as blood syrups, cough syrups, and malarial drugs. He hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow him to improve his standard of living, and plans to expand his business in the future. Alpha thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more medicines such as blood syrups, cough syrups and malarial drugs.

loans.name: Omaira Estrella

texts.es:
Con el objetivo de ofrecerles un mejor futuro a sus hijos de 10 y 15 años, Omaira se ha venido dedicando por cerca de 2 años, a la venta de mercancía.

Esta mujer trabajadora no se ha dejado vencer por la adversidad y a pesar de que la falta de recursos siempre ha sido un obstáculo para invertir en su negocio, ella sigue perseverando en su propósito de salir adelante. Es por ello, que en este momento lo que más requiere son los recursos económicos para invertir en la compra de surtido y de una vitrina, mediante la cual podrá atraer a más clientes gracias a lo llamativo de la exhibición que se propondría tener.
texts.en:
With the goal of offering a better future to her children who are 10 and 15 years old, Omaira has been selling merchandise for about two years.  This hardworking woman has not let herself be defeated by adversity and despite the lack of resources that has always been an obstacle for her to invest in her business; she continues to persevere in her determination to get ahead.

This is why at this moment what she most needs is economic resources to invest in a selection of merchandise and to buy a display case so that she can attract more customers thanks to the showy display she’ll be able to have.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her business and a display case.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en: Eva lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children and all her children go to school. She takes care of one additional family member (a sister).She sells second-hand clothes at the market. In addition, she does part-time tailoring. She has been in this business for the last six years. She works six days a week .She has requested a loan of 2,000,000 from MCDT SACCO to buy more bales of second-hand clothes. Her goals and aspirations are to become a wholesaler and to buy a plot of land and build rental houses. Her major business challenges are defaulters, transportation and the increasing prices of used clothes in Uganda. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and medication.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used clothes

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.es: El Sr. Cirilo de 46 años, esta casado y tiene  un hijo de 7 años que se encuentra en edad escolar, se dedica al sector de la vidriería, realiza todo tipo de trabajo con vidrio, vive en casa de su hermano como cuidador, desde hace 6 años, el sr.  Cirilo tiene también en su Local un teléfono público que atiende todo los días, el Sr. Cirilo se vio en la necesidad de solicitar crédito de nuestra institución para la compra de vidrios, marcos y pegamento debido a la demanda que posee actualmente tiene muchos trabajos que entregar, el tiene un buen Historial de deuda, es cliente antiguo de la institución con buen comportamiento de pago, se siente muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que siempre le brinda.
texts.en:
Cirilo, 46, is married and has a 7-year-old son who is school aged.  He is a glazier.   He does all kinds of jobs with glass.  He has lived in his brother’s house as a custodian for the last six years.  Cirilo also has a public phone booth in his glass shop that he tends to daily.

Cirilo found himself in the need of requesting a loan from our institution to buy glass, frames and adhesive due to the demand he has now because he has several pending jobs to deliver.  He has a good credit history and is a longstanding client of the institution with a good repayment history.  He feels grateful to the institution for the support it’s always given him.

loans.use: to buy glass, mirrors, frames and adhesive.

loans.name: Merina

texts.en: Merina lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed with six children and two of her children go to school. She takes care of additional family members (grandchildren). She operates a retail shop at home. She has been in this business for the last 10 years.  She works seven days a week .She has requested a loan of 1,000,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of rice, sugar, cartons of salt and boxes of soap.  She generates additional income through rental rooms. Her goals and aspirations are to expand her business into a wholesale shop and to build more rental rooms. Her major business challenges are seasonality, on and off electricity and transportation. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and utility bills.

loans.use: To buy more suagr, salt, soap and rice

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es: La Sra. Emiliana vive en la  zona Capacachi, es casada tiene tres hijos que se encuentran estudiando, que asume con sus gastos de educación, es de clase humilde y sencilla que tubo que trabajar mucho para salir adelante, es muy trabajadora y sacrificada, se dedica a la venta de papa por mayor en los mercados de la ciudad de Cochabamba  y tambien vende sus productos en la localidad de Sacaba en los distintos mercados, el crédito solicita es para la compra de papa por carga y así de esta modo aumentar su capital de trabajo, la Sra. Emiliana es una persona muy amable,  se siente agradecida por la confianza que se le brindo.
texts.en: Emiliana lives in Capacachi.  She’s married and has three children who are going to school.  She takes care of their educational costs.  She is of a humble, unassuming class and has had to work very hard to get ahead.  She is very hardworking and selfless.  She sells potatoes at wholesale in the farmers markets in the city of Cochabamba and in the  market in Sacaba.  The loan she’s requesting is to buy a carload of potatoes to increase her working capital.  Emiliana is a very kind person who feels grateful for the trust that’s been placed in her.

loans.use: to buy a carload of potatoes.

loans.name: Gladys Rosa

texts.es: Gladys Rosa, es una mujer cabeza de familia que sola debe sacar adelante a sus cuatro hijos, con su negocio de compra y venta de gas propano. El servicio incluye el transporte de los cilindros que pesan entre 33 y 40 libras y que Gladys hace en su bicicleta. Esta gran mujer quiere ampliar su negocio comprando con el préstamo más cilindros de gas y su sueño es montar una tienda en su casa para aumentar sus ingresos y poder ayudarle a sus hijos a terminar sus estudios.
texts.en: Gladys Rosa is the head of her family. She needs to make progress to help her four children through her business buying and selling propane gas. This service includes the transport of the cylinders. These cylinders weigh between 33 and 40 pounds. Gladys transports them on her bicycle. This great woman wants to expand her business. With the loan, she will purchase more gas cylinders. Her dream is to have a store in her house in order increase her income and to be able to help her children finish their studies.

loans.use: purchase cylinders and an assortment of merchandise to sell from her house.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en: Jessica lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with four children and one of her children goes to school. She has two additional family members. She sells second-hand clothes on a retail basis at the market.  She has been in this business for the last eight years. She works six days a week .She has requested a loan of 1,000,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bales of second hand clothes. She generates additional income through knitting tablecloths. Jessica’s goals and aspirations are to start importing used clothes and to be a wholesaler. Her major business challenges are seasonality and the ever-increasing prices of second hand clothes. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include food and medication.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used clothes

loans.name: Damacio

texts.es: El señor  Damacio, nacido en la comunidad de Padilla de la ciudad de  Chuquisaca de 57 años, dedicado a la agricultura conjuntamente con su señora esposa desde hace  26 años , actualmente radica en la comunidad de Tupac Katari, de la localidad de la Guardia,  El señor tiene su parcela propia y esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de semillas para sembrar maíz y maní y también para lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, junto con su hija Pascuala quien le ayuda en la siembra y en la comercialización de sus productos,  el señor Damacio esta muy agradecido por el apoyo que se le esta brindando.
texts.en: Damacio is a native of the community of Padilla in the city of Chuquisaca. He is 57 years old and makes a living in agriculture working alongside his wife for the past 26 years. He currently resides in the community of Tupac Katari in the locality of La Guardia. He has his own plot of land and is requesting the loan to purchase seeds to plant corn and peanuts. He prepares the land with daughter Pascuala, who helps him with planting and also selling the products. Damacio is very grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase seeds to plant corn and peanuts.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es: Daniela es madre soltera de tres hijos, uno de 5 años, otro de 2 años y el último de 2 meses que hacen que esta mujer luche cada día por salir adelante de la mano con su fritadora en la que hace comidas rápidas. El préstamo le ayudará a Daniela a comprar surtido y un carrito de perros que sería el único en su barrio ya que nadie más presta este servicio. El gran sueño es poder montar su negocio de comidas rápidas en un local con todas las especificaciones y seguir para adelante con sus tres hijos y su mamá.
texts.en: Daniela is a single mother of three children, ages 5, 2 and 2 months, for whom she fights everyday to make headway with her fast-food fryer business. The loan will help Daniela to purchase and stock a hot dog cart, which will be the only one in her neighborhood since no one else offers that service. Her biggest dream is to set up her fast-food business in a store with all of her specifications and to keep making progress for her three children and her mother.

loans.use: to purchase a hot dog cart.

loans.name: Riane Lourdez

texts.es: La Sra. Riane nació en la localidad de el Torno, vive en la zona Bolivia, cuenta con casa propia,  es peluquera y también maestra, es casada y su esposo Jorge,  el cual tiene la actividad de crianza de chancho cuentan  con dos hijos que son menores de edad que se encuentran en edad escolar, La Sra. Riane ha solicitado un crédito para aumentar los  implementos para la peluquería, como tintes, líquidos para permanentes,  es cliente antigua y responsable por lo tanto nuevamente están muy agradecidos con la institución por el apoyo económico que les ha brindado  para mejorar su calidad de vida
texts.en: Riane is a native of Torno, Bolivia, and has her own home. She is a hair stylist and also is a teacher. She is married to Jorge, who makes a living raising pigs, and they have two children who are in school. Riane is requesting the loan to purchase business supplies, such as dyes and permanent liquids, for her salon. She is a previous loan client and has been responsible, and is once again very grateful for the support in helping her improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to add business supplies like dyes and permanent liquids.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children and all her children go to school. She takes care of one additional family member (a sister). She operates a restaurant. She sells her products from home and her customers are her neighbors. Her other source of income is from rental houses and dry cleaning services.  She has been in this business for the last six years. She works seven days a week .She has requested a loan of 500,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bananas, a bag of rice, beef, cooking oil, and saucepans. Her goals and aspirations are to own a fully stocked restaurant and to build more rental houses. Her major business challenges are seasonality and transportation. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and medication

loans.use: To buy more bananas, beef, rice, cooking oil and saucepans

loans.name: Justina

texts.es: la señora Justina  es cliente antigua D. la institución la señora vive en la zona D. Bella Vista ella vive en su propia casa con su hijo  que ya es independiente, ella se dedica a la venta D. leche en polvo,  en la plaza D. la zona por las noches ya que la alcaldía no le permite salir por el día ella además tiene una segunda actividad la cual la realiza esporádicamente ya que ella se entra a la minaa trabajar, cuando no hay mucha venta D. su mercadería, esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra D. leche por mayor ya que se aproximan las fiestas D. fin D. año y tendrá mucha venta, ella es una persona ya mayor pero sigue con ganas D. seguir trabajando, se siente agradecida por el apoyo que se le esta brindando.
texts.en: Señora Justina is a longstanding member of the institution. She lives in the Bella Vista area in her own house with her child, who is already independent. She sells powdered milk in the neighbourhood square at night as the town hall does not allow her to go out during the day. In addition she has another activity which she performs sporadically as she goes down the mines to work when there is little uptake of her merchandise. She is asking for the loan to buy powdered milk in bulk as the end-of-year celebrations are approaching and she will have a lot of sales. She is already an elderly person but she has the desire to keep on working. She is grateful for the support given her.

loans.use: to buy powdered milk in bulk.

loans.name: Norbey Alejandro

texts.es: En su tienda, que muy acertadamente llamó “El toldo de la Abuela Nana” Norbey Alejandro deposita todos sus sueños y las ganas de salir adelante para que su hijo crezca con todos los cuidados y comodidades que se merece. Invertir el préstamo en una planta y un equipo de sonido será lo primero que haga, ya que éste hará que los clientes se sientan a gusto en su tienda, por la ambientación musical y por que en las noches cuando las ventas de cerveza y licor aumentan será necesario atraer a más clientes con la música, considera que prestar un mejor servicio es vital para salir adelante con su vida, la de su hijo y por supuesto la de su negocio, pretende mejorar las ventas, alargar sus horarios de trabajo y finalmente incrementar las utilidades que le deja su negocio, aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: In his store, aptly called “El Toldo de la Abuela Nana” ("The Grandmother Nana's Awning"), Norbey Alejandro has placed all his dreams and desires to get ahead so that his child grows up all the comfort and care that s/he deserves. The first thing he will do is invest in a sound system, since this will make his clients feel at home in his store with ambient music, and because during the night when sales of liquor and beer increase it will be necessary to attract more clients with music. He considers this loan to be vital to get ahead with his life, his son's life, and of course of his business. He hopes to improve his sales, increase his working hours and finally increase the utility of his business, increase his income, and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a sound system and a stand to improve service.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en: Shamim lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with three children. Two of her children go to school. She has one additional family member. She operates a beauty salon.  She sells her products from home and works on all categories of people. She sells popcorn as her other source of income.  She has been in business for the last year. She works seven days a week. She has requested for a loan of 400,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more boxes of cream relaxers and weaves. Shamim's goals and aspirations are own a bridal salon and to buy a plot of land. Her major business challenges are defaulters, and on and off electricity. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and utility bills.

loans.use: To buy more boxes of cream relaxers and weaves
